word.kjv: Turn again, my daughters, go your way; for I am too old to have an husband. If I should say, I have hope, if I should have an husband also to night, and should also bear sons;
word.thailand: ลูกสาวของแม่เอ๋ย กลับไปเสียเถอะ กลับไปตามทางของเจ้า แม่แก่เกินที่จะมีสามีแล้ว หากแม่จะว่าแม่ยังมีความหวังอยู่ ถ้าแม่จะมีสามีคืนวันนี้และให้กำเนิดบุตรชาย
word.spanish1909: Volveos, hijas mías, é idos; que yo ya soy vieja para ser para varón. Y aunque dijese: Esperanza tengo; y esta noche fuese con varón, y aun pariese hijos;
word.latinvulgate: Revertimini, filiæ meæ, et abite : jam enim senectute confecta sum, nec apta vinculo conjugali : etiamsi possem hac nocte concipere, et parere filios,
word.italian1927: Ritornatevene, figliuole mie, andate! Io son troppo vecchia per rimaritarmi; e anche se dicessi: Ne ho speranza, e andassi a marito stasera, e partorissi de’ figliuoli,
word.german1912: Kehrt um, meine Töchter, und geht hin! denn ich bin nun zu alt, daß ich einen Mann nehme. Und wenn ich spräche: Es ist zu hoffen, daß ich diese Nacht einen Mann nehme und Kinder gebäre,
word.french1910: Retournez, mes filles, allez! Je suis trop vieille pour me remarier. Et quand je dirais: J'ai de l'espérance; quand cette nuit même je serais avec un mari, et que j'enfanterais des fils,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 走吧，我女兒啊，你們回去吧，因為我太老，不能嫁人了，就算我說我還有希望今天晚上有個丈夫，又生兒子，
word.korean: 내 딸들아 돌이켜 너희 길로 가라 나는 늙었으니 남편을 두지 못할지라 가령 내가 소망이 있다고 말한다든지 오늘 밤에 남편을 두어서 아들들을 생산한다 하자
word.tagalog: Kayo'y magsibalik, mga anak ko, magpatuloy kayo ng inyong lakad; sapagka't ako'y totoong matanda na upang magkaroon pa ng asawa. Kung aking sabihin, Ako'y may pagasa, kung ako'y magkaasawa man ngayong gabi, at ako'y magkakaanak man;
word.maori: Hoki atu, e aku tamahine, haere, kua ruruhitia nei hoki ahau, a e kore e whai tahu. Me i ki ahau, Kei te tumanako ahau, tera ano ahau e whai tane i tenei po, a ka whanau ano he tama maku;
word.cebuano: Pamauli kamo mga anak ko, padayon kamo; kay ako tigulang na kaayo nga mobaton pa ug bana. Kong ako moingon, ako may paglaum pa, kong ako makabaton usab ug usa ka bana karong gabii, ug manganak usab ug mga lalake;
word.hebrew: יב שבנה בנתי לכן כי זקנתי מהיות לאיש  כי אמרתי יש לי תקוה--גם הייתי הלילה לאיש וגם ילדתי בנים
word.hebrewmodern: שבנה בנתי לכן כי זקנתי מהיות לאיש כי אמרתי יש לי תקוה גם הייתי הלילה לאיש וגם ילדתי בנים׃
word.greekot: ἐπιστράφητε δή θυγατέρες μου διότι γεγήρακα τοῦ μὴ εἶναι ἀνδρί ὅτι εἶπα ὅτι ἔστιν μοι ὑπόστασις τοῦ γενηθῆναί με ἀνδρὶ καὶ τέξομαι υἱούς

word.kjv: And Shechaniah the son of Jehiel, one of the sons of Elam, answered and said unto Ezra, We have trespassed against our God, and have taken strange wives of the people of the land: yet now there is hope in Israel concerning this thing.
word.thailand: และเชคานิยาห์บุตรชายเยฮีเอล คนเอลามกล่าวแก่เอสราว่า "พวกเราทั้งหลายได้ละเมิดต่อพระเจ้าของเราเสียแล้ว และได้แต่งงานกับหญิงต่างชาติจากชนชาติทั้งหลายของแผ่นดินนี้ แต่ถึงจะมีเรื่องอย่างนี้ ก็ยังมีความหวังในอิสราเอลอยู่
word.spanish1909: Entonces respondió Sechânías hijo de Jehiel, de los hijos Elam, y dijo á Esdras: Nosotros hemos prevaricado contra nuestro Dios, pues tomamos mujeres extranjeras de los pueblos de la tierra: mas hay aún esperanza para Israel sobre esto.
word.latinvulgate: Et respondit Sechenias filius Jehiel de filiis Ælam, et dixit Esdræ : Nos prævaricati sumus in Deum nostrum, et duximus uxores alienigenas de populis terræ : et nunc, si est pœnitentia in Israël super hoc,
word.italian1927: Allora Scecania, figliuolo di Jehiel, uno de’ figliuoli di Elam, prese a dire a Esdra: "Noi siamo stati infedeli al nostro Dio, sposando donne straniere prese dai popoli di questo paese; nondimeno, rimane ancora, a questo riguardo, una speranza a Israele.
word.german1912: Und Sechanja, der Sohn Jehiels, aus den Kindern Elam, antwortete und sprach zu Esra: Wohlan, wir haben uns an unserm Gott vergriffen, daß wir fremde Weiber aus den Völkern des Landes genommen haben. Nun, es ist noch Hoffnung für Israel über dem.
word.french1910: Alors Schecania, fils de Jehiel, d'entre les fils d'Elam, prit la parole et dit à Esdras: Nous avons péché contre notre Dieu, en nous alliant à des femmes étrangères qui appartiennent aux peuples du pays. Mais Israël ne reste pas pour cela sans espérance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 屬以攔的子孫、耶歇的兒子示迦尼對以斯拉說：“我們對　神不忠，娶了這地這外族女子為妻。雖然這樣，以色列現在還有希望。
word.korean: 엘람 자손 중 여히엘의 아들 스가냐가 에스라에게 이르되 `우리가 우리 하나님께 범죄하여 이 땅 이방 여자를 취하여 아내를 삼았으나 이스라엘에게 오히려 소망이 있나니
word.tagalog: At si Sechanias na anak ni Jehiel, na isa sa mga anak ni Elam, ay sumagot at nagsabi kay Ezra: Kami ay nagsisalangsang laban sa ating Dios, at nangagasawa sa mga babaing taga ibang bayan ng lupain: gayon man, may pagasa sa Israel tungkol sa bagay na ito.
word.maori: Na ka oho a Hekania tama a Tehiere, ko tetahi nei ia o nga tama a Erama, ka mea ki a Etera, Kua he matou ki to tatou Atua, kua tango i nga wahine ke, i a nga iwi o te whenua. Tenei ano ia he mea e marama ai nga whakaaro o Iharaira ki tenei mea.
word.cebuano: Ug si Sechanias ang anak nga lalake ni Jehiel, usa sa mga anak nga lalake ni Elam, mitubag ug miingon kang Esdras: Kami nakalapas batok sa atong Dios, ug nangasawa sa mga babaye nga dumuloong sa mga katawohan sa yuta: apan karon may paglaum pa alang sa Israel mahitungod niining butanga.
word.hebrew: ב ויען שכניה בן יחיאל מבני עולם (עילם) ויאמר לעזרא--אנחנו מעלנו באלהינו ונשב נשים נכריות מעמי הארץ ועתה יש מקוה לישראל על זאת
word.hebrewmodern: ויען שכניה בן יחיאל מבני עולם ויאמר לעזרא אנחנו מעלנו באלהינו ונשב נשים נכריות מעמי הארץ ועתה יש מקוה לישראל על זאת׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἀπεκρίθη σεχενιας υἱὸς ιιηλ ἀπὸ υἱῶν ηλαμ καὶ εἶπεν τῷ εσδρα ἡμεῖς ἠσυνθετήσαμεν τῷ θεῷ ἡμῶν καὶ ἐκαθίσαμεν γυναῖκας ἀλλοτρίας ἀπὸ λαῶν τῆς γῆς καὶ νῦν ἔστιν ὑπομονὴ τῷ ισραηλ ἐπὶ τούτῳ

word.kjv: Now in the twelfth month, that is, the month Adar, on the thirteenth day of the same, when the king's commandment and his decree drew near to be put in execution, in the day that the enemies of the Jews hoped to have power over them, (though it was turned to the contrary, that the Jews had rule over them that hated them;)
word.thailand: ในเดือนที่สิบสองซึ่งเป็นเดือนอาดาร์ วันที่สิบสามเดือนนั้น เมื่อจะปฏิบัติตามพระบัญชาของกษัตริย์และกฤษฎีกา ในวันนั้นเองที่ศัตรูของพวกยิวหวังจะเป็นใหญ่เหนือพวกยิว (แต่ซึ่งถูกเปลี่ยนไป เป็นวันที่พวกยิวได้ความเป็นใหญ่เหนือพวกที่เกลียดชังเขา)
word.spanish1909: Y EN el mes duodécimo y que es el mes de Adar, á trece del mismo, en el que tocaba se ejecutase el mandamiento del rey y su ley, el mismo día en que esperaban los enemigos de los Judíos enseñorearse de ellos, fué lo contrario; porque los Judíos se enseñor
word.latinvulgate: Igitur duodecimi mensis, quem Adar vocari ante jam diximus, tertiadecima die, quando cunctis Judæis interfectio parabatur, et hostes eorum inhiabant sanguini, versa vice Judæi superiores esse cœperunt, et se de adversariis vindicare.
word.italian1927: Il dodicesimo mese, ch’è il mese d’Adar, il tredicesimo giorno del mese, quando l’ordine del re e il suo decreto doveano esser mandati ad effetto, il giorno che i nemici de’ Giudei speravano d’averli in loro potere, avvenne invece tutto il contrario; poiché furono i Giudei ch’ebbero in loro potere i loro nemici.
word.german1912: Im zwölften Monat, das ist der Monat Adar, am dreizehnten Tag, den des Königs Wort und Gebot bestimmt hatte, daß man's tun sollte, ebendesselben Tages, da die Feinde der Juden hofften, sie zu überwältigen, wandte sich's, daß die Juden ihre Feinde überwältigen sollten.
word.french1910: Au douzième mois, qui est le mois d'Adar, le treizième jour du mois, jour où devaient s'exécuter l'ordre et l'édit du roi, et où les ennemis des Juifs avaient espéré dominer sur eux, ce fut le contraire qui arriva, et les Juifs dominèrent sur leurs ennemis.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 猶大人殺戮仇敵十二月，就是亞達月，十三日，王的命令和諭旨快要執行的時候，就是猶大人的仇敵盼望轄制猶大人的日子，反成了猶大人轄制恨他們的人的日子。
word.korean: 아달월 곧 십이월 십 삼일은 왕의 조명을 행하게 된 날이라 유다인의 대적이 저희를 제어하기를 바랐더니 유다인이 도리어 자기를 미워하는 자를 제어하게 된 그 날에
word.tagalog: Sa ikalabing dalawang buwan nga, na siyang buwan ng Adar, nang ikalabing tatlong araw ng buwan ding yaon, nang ang utos ng hari at ang pasiya niya ay malapit nang gagawin, nang araw na inaasahan ng mga kaaway ng mga Judio na magpuno sa kanila; (yamang napabaligtad, na ang mga Judio ay siyang naghari sa kanila na nangapopoot sa kanila),
word.maori: ¶ Na i te tekau ma rua o nga marama, ara i te marama Arara, i te tekau ma toru o nga ra, i te mea ka tata te mahia te kupu a te kingi, me tana ture, i te ra ano i hua ai nga hoariri o nga Hurai ka taea e ratou; otiia i puta ke ano, no te mea i taea e nga Hurai te hunga i kino ki a ratou;
word.cebuano: Karon sa ikapulo ug duha ka bulan, nga mao ang bulan sa Adar, sa ikanapulo ug tolo ka adlaw sa maong bulan , sa diha nga ang sugo sa hari ug ang iyang pagbulot-an haduol na nga pagatumanon, sa adlaw nga ang mga kaaway sa mga Judio naglaum nga makaghari kanila (apan nasuhi, nga kini nabalit-ad kay ang mga Judio naghari niadtong mga nagadumot kanila),
word.hebrew: א ובשנים עשר חדש הוא חדש אדר בשלושה עשר יום בו אשר הגיע דבר המלך ודתו להעשות  ביום אשר שברו איבי היהודים לשלוט בהם ונהפוך הוא אשר ישלטו היהודים המה בשנאיהם
word.hebrewmodern: ובשנים עשר חדש הוא חדש אדר בשלושה עשר יום בו אשר הגיע דבר המלך ודתו להעשות ביום אשר שברו איבי היהודים לשלוט בהם ונהפוך הוא אשר ישלטו היהודים המה בשנאיהם׃
word.greekot: ἐν γὰρ τῷ δωδεκάτῳ μηνὶ τρισκαιδεκάτῃ τοῦ μηνός ὅς ἐστιν αδαρ παρῆν τὰ γράμματα τὰ γραφέντα ὑπὸ τοῦ βασιλέως

word.kjv: Is not this thy fear, thy confidence, thy hope, and the uprightness of thy ways?
word.thailand: ความยำเกรงของท่าน ความมั่นใจของท่าน ความหวังของท่าน และการประพฤติดีรอบคอบของท่านอยู่ที่ไหนเล่า
word.spanish1909: ¿Es este tu temor, tu confianza, Tu esperanza, y la perfección de tus caminos?
word.latinvulgate: Ubi est timor tuus, fortitudo tua ? patientia tua et perfectio viarum tuarum ?
word.italian1927: La tua pietà non è forse la tua fiducia, e l’integrità della tua vita la speranza tua?
word.german1912: Ist nicht deine Gottesfurcht dein Trost, deine Hoffnung die Unsträflichkeit deiner Wege?
word.french1910: Ta crainte de Dieu n'est-elle pas ton soutien? Ton espérance, n'est-ce pas ton intégrité?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神賞善罰惡你所自恃的，不是敬畏　神嗎？你所盼望的，不是行為完全嗎？
word.korean: 네 의뢰가 경외함에 있지 아니하냐 ? 네 소망이 네 행위를 완전히 함에 있지 아니하냐 ?
word.tagalog: Hindi ba ang iyong takot sa Dios ay ang iyong tiwala, at ang iyong pagasa ay ang pagtatapat ng iyong mga lakad?
word.maori: He taka ianei kei tou wehi ki te Atua he okiokinga whakaaro mou? Kei te tapatahi o ou huarahi he tumanakohanga mou?
word.cebuano: Dili ba ang imong kahadlok sa Dios maoy imong saliganan, Ug ang pagkatul-id sa imong mga dalan maoy imong ginalauman?
word.hebrew: ו  הלא יראתך כסלתך    תקותך ותם דרכיך
word.hebrewmodern: הלא יראתך כסלתך תקותך ותם דרכיך׃
word.greekot: πότερον οὐχ ὁ φόβος σού ἐστιν ἐν ἀφροσύνῃ καὶ ἡ ἐλπίς σου καὶ ἡ ἀκακία τῆς ὁδοῦ σου

word.kjv: So the poor hath hope, and iniquity stoppeth her mouth.
word.thailand: คนจนจึงมีความหวัง และความชั่วช้าก็ปิดปากของตน
word.spanish1909: Pues es esperanza al menesteroso, Y la iniquidad cerrará su boca.
word.latinvulgate: Et erit egeno spes ; iniquitas autem contrahet os suum.
word.italian1927: E così pel misero v’è speranza, mentre l’iniquità ha la bocca chiusa.
word.german1912: und ist des Armen Hoffnung, daß die Bosheit wird ihren Mund müssen zuhalten.
word.french1910: Et l'espérance soutient le malheureux, Mais l'iniquité ferme la bouche.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這樣，貧窮人有指望，不義的人卻閉口無言。
word.korean: 그러므로 가난한 자가 소망이 있고 불의가 스스로 입을 막느니라
word.tagalog: Na anopa't ang dukha ay may pagasa, at ang kasamaan ay nagtitikom ng kaniyang bibig.
word.maori: Ka ai ano he tumanakohanga atu mo te ware; kokopi tonu ia te mangai o te kino.
word.cebuano: Busa ang kabus may palaabuton, Ug ang kasal-anan magatak-om sa baba niya.
word.hebrew: טז  ותהי לדל תקוה    ועלתה קפצה פיה
word.hebrewmodern: ותהי לדל תקוה ועלתה קפצה פיה׃
word.greekot: εἴη δὲ ἀδυνάτῳ ἐλπίς ἀδίκου δὲ στόμα ἐμφραχθείη

word.kjv: What is my strength, that I should hope? and what is mine end, that I should prolong my life?
word.thailand: ข้ามีกำลังอะไร ที่ข้าจะมีความหวัง และอะไรเป็นอวสานของข้า ที่ข้าจะต่อชีวิตของข้า
word.spanish1909: ¿Cuál es mi fortaleza para esperar aún? ¿Y cuál mi fin para dilatar mi vida?
word.latinvulgate: Quæ est enim fortitudo mea, ut sustineam ? aut quis finis meus, ut patienter agam ?
word.italian1927: Che è mai la mia forza perch’io speri ancora? Che fine m’aspetta perch’io sia paziente?
word.german1912: Was ist meine Kraft, daß ich möge beharren? und welches ist mein Ende, daß meine Seele geduldig sein sollte?
word.french1910: Pourquoi espérer quand je n'ai plus de force? Pourquoi attendre quand ma fin est certaine?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我有甚麼力量使我能等候呢？我的結局是甚麼好叫我忍耐呢？
word.korean: 내가 무슨 기력이 있관대 기다리겠느냐 ? 내 마지막이 어떠하겠관대 오히려 참겠느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Ano ang aking lakas, na ako'y maghihintay? At ano ang aking wakas na ako'y magtitiis?
word.maori: He aha toku kaha, e tatari ai ahau? He aha hoki toku mutunga, e whakamanawanui ai ahau?
word.cebuano: Unsa ba ang akong kusog, nga ako magapaabut man? Ug unsa ang akong katapusan nga ako magapailob?
word.hebrew: יא  מה-כחי כי-איחל    ומה-קצי כי-אאריך נפשי
word.hebrewmodern: מה כחי כי איחל ומה קצי כי אאריך נפשי׃
word.greekot: τίς γάρ μου ἡ ἰσχύς ὅτι ὑπομένω ἢ τίς μου ὁ χρόνος ὅτι ἀνέχεταί μου ἡ ψυχή

word.kjv: They were confounded because they had hoped; they came thither, and were ashamed.
word.thailand: เพราะเขาทั้งหลายหวังใจ เขาจึงต้องผิดหวัง เขามาถึงที่นั่นและต้องละอายใจ
word.spanish1909: Mas fueron avergonzados por su esperanza; Porque vinieron hasta ellas, y halláronse confusos.
word.latinvulgate: Confusi sunt, quia speravi, venerunt quoque usque ad me, et pudore cooperti sunt.
word.italian1927: ma furon delusi nella loro fiducia; giunti sul luogo, rimasero confusi.
word.german1912: aber sie wurden zu Schanden über ihrer Hoffnung und mußten sich schämen, als sie dahin kamen.
word.french1910: Ils sont honteux d'avoir eu confiance, Ils restent confondus quand ils arrivent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們失望，因為所盼望的落了空；他們到達那裡就灰心。
word.korean: 거기 와서는 바라던 것을 부끄리고 낙심하느니라
word.tagalog: Sila'y nangapahiya, sapagka't sila'y nagsiasa; sila'y nagsiparoon at nangatulig.
word.maori: Whakama ana ratou mo ratou i whakamanawa atu ki reira; te taenga ki aua awa, kanakana kau ana.
word.cebuano: Sila gipakaulawan kay sila minglaum; Sila nanganhi ug nangalibug.
word.hebrew: כ  בשו כי-בטח    באו עדיה ויחפרו
word.hebrewmodern: בשו כי בטח באו עדיה ויחפרו׃
word.greekot: καὶ αἰσχύνην ὀφειλήσουσιν οἱ ἐπὶ πόλεσιν καὶ χρήμασιν πεποιθότες

word.kjv: My days are swifter than a weaver's shuttle, and are spent without hope.
word.thailand: วันคืนของข้าเร็วกว่ากระสวยของช่างทอ และสิ้นสุดลงด้วยไร้ความหวัง
word.spanish1909: Y mis días fueron más ligeros que la lanzadera del tejedor, Y fenecieron sin esperanza.
word.latinvulgate: Dies mei velocius transierunt quam a texente tela succiditur ; et consumpti sunt absque ulla spe.
word.italian1927: I miei giorni sen vanno più veloci della spola, si consumano senza speranza.
word.german1912: Meine Tage sind leichter dahingeflogen denn die Weberspule und sind vergangen, daß kein Aufhalten dagewesen ist.
word.french1910: Mes jours sont plus rapides que la navette du tisserand, Ils s'évanouissent: plus d'espérance!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我過的日子比梭還要快，在毫無盼望之中而結束。
word.korean: 나의 날은 베틀의 북보다 빠르니 소망없이 보내는구나
word.tagalog: Ang aking mga kaarawan ay matulin kay sa panghabi ng manghahabi, at nagugugol na walang pagasa.
word.maori: Ko oku ra hohoro atu i te rakau a te kaiwhatu; pau ake, te ai he tumanakohanga atu.
word.cebuano: Ang akong mga adlaw labing matulin kay sa lansadera sa maghahabol, Ug natapus nga walay paglaum.
word.hebrew: ו  ימי קלו מני-ארג    ויכלו באפס תקוה
word.hebrewmodern: ימי קלו מני ארג ויכלו באפס תקוה׃
word.greekot: ὁ δὲ βίος μού ἐστιν ἐλαφρότερος λαλιᾶς ἀπόλωλεν δὲ ἐν κενῇ ἐλπίδι

word.kjv: So are the paths of all that forget God; and the hypocrite's hope shall perish:
word.thailand: ทางของบรรดาผู้ที่ลืมพระเจ้าก็เป็นอย่างนั้นแหละ ความหวังของคนหน้าซื่อใจคดจะพินาศไป
word.spanish1909: Tales son los caminos de todos los que olvidan á Dios: Y la esperanza del impío perecerá:
word.latinvulgate: Sic viæ omnium qui obliviscuntur Deum, et spes hypocritæ peribit.
word.italian1927: Tale la sorte di tutti quei che dimenticano Dio, e la speranza dell’empio perirà.
word.german1912: So geht es allen denen, die Gottes vergessen; und die Hoffnung der Heuchler wird verloren sein.
word.french1910: Ainsi arrive-t-il à tous ceux qui oublient Dieu, Et l'espérance de l'impie périra.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 忘記　神的，他們的末路也是這樣；不敬虔的人，他的指望必成泡影。
word.korean: 하나님을 잊어버리는 자의 길은 다 이와 같고 사곡한 자의 소망은 없어지리니
word.tagalog: Gayon ang mga landas ng lahat na nagsisilimot sa Dios; at ang pagasa ng di banal ay mawawala:
word.maori: Ka pera ano nga ara o te hunga katoa e wareware ana ki te Atua, a ka riro ki te kore ta te tangata whakaponokore i tumanako ai.
word.cebuano: Mao man ang kadalanan sa tanan nga mahikalimot sa Dios; Ug ang paglaum sa tawo nga walay Dios mawagtang:
word.hebrew: יג  כן--ארחות כל-שכחי אל    ותקות חנף תאבד
word.hebrewmodern: כן ארחות כל שכחי אל ותקות חנף תאבד׃
word.greekot: οὕτως τοίνυν ἔσται τὰ ἔσχατα πάντων τῶν ἐπιλανθανομένων τοῦ κυρίου ἐλπὶς γὰρ ἀσεβοῦς ἀπολεῖται

word.kjv: Whose hope shall be cut off, and whose trust shall be a spider's web.
word.thailand: ความหวังใจของเขาหักสะบั้น และความไว้วางใจของเขาจะเหมือนใยแมงมุม
word.spanish1909: Porque su esperanza será cortada, Y su confianza es casa de araña.
word.latinvulgate: Non ei placebit vecordia sua, et sicut tela aranearum fiducia ejus.
word.italian1927: La sua baldanza è troncata, la sua fiducia e come una tela di ragno.
word.german1912: Denn seine Zuversicht vergeht, und seine Hoffnung ist eine Spinnwebe.
word.french1910: Son assurance est brisée, Son soutien est une toile d'araignée.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他所自恃的，必被折斷；他所靠賴的，不過是蜘蛛網。
word.korean: 그 믿는 것이 끊어지고 그 의지하는 것이 거미줄 같은즉
word.tagalog: Na ang kaniyang pagtitiwala ay mapaparam, at ang kaniyang tiwala ay isang bahay gagamba.
word.maori: Ka motuhia atu tana i whakamanawa atu ai, ko te whare hoki o te pungawerewere hei tumanakohanga mona.
word.cebuano: Ang iyang pagsalig pagaputlon, Ug ang iyang kalig-onan maoy usa ka balay sa lawa-lawa.
word.hebrew: יד  אשר-יקוט כסלו    ובית עכביש מבטחו
word.hebrewmodern: אשר יקוט כסלו ובית עכביש מבטחו׃
word.greekot: ἀοίκητος γὰρ αὐτοῦ ἔσται ὁ οἶκος ἀράχνη δὲ αὐτοῦ ἀποβήσεται ἡ σκηνή

word.kjv: And thou shalt be secure, because there is hope; yea, thou shalt dig about thee, and thou shalt take thy rest in safety.
word.thailand: และท่านจะรู้สึกมั่นคง เพราะมีความหวัง เออ ท่านจะตรวจตราดู และนอนพักอย่างปลอดภัย
word.spanish1909: Y confiarás, que habrá esperanza; Y cavarás, y dormirás seguro:
word.latinvulgate: Et habebis fiduciam, proposita tibi spe, et defossus securus dormies.
word.italian1927: Sarai fiducioso perché avrai speranza; ti guarderai bene attorno e ti coricherai sicuro.
word.german1912: und dürftest dich dessen trösten, daß Hoffnung da sei; würdest dich umsehen und in Sicherheit schlafen legen;
word.french1910: Tu seras plein de confiance, et ton attente ne sera plus vaine; Tu regarderas autour de toi, et tu reposeras en sûreté.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為有指望，你必安穩，你必四處巡查，安然睡覺。
word.korean: 네가 소망이 있으므로 든든할지며 두루 살펴보고 안전히 쉬리니
word.tagalog: At ikaw ay matitiwasay sapagka't may pagasa; Oo, ikaw ay magsiyasat sa palibot mo, at magpapahinga kang tiwasay.
word.maori: Ka tatu ou whakaaro, no te mea ka whai tumanakohanga atu; ae, ka rapu koe i tetahi taha ou, i tetahi taha, a ka takoto marire koe.
word.cebuano: Ug ikaw magmalig-on kay anaa may paglaum; Oo, ikaw magapangita sa libut nimo , ug sa lig-on ikaw mopahulay.
word.hebrew: יח  ובטחת כי-יש תקוה    וחפרת לבטח תשכב
word.hebrewmodern: ובטחת כי יש תקוה וחפרת לבטח תשכב׃
word.greekot: πεποιθώς τε ἔσῃ ὅτι ἔστιν σοι ἐλπίς ἐκ δὲ μερίμνης καὶ φροντίδος ἀναφανεῖταί σοι εἰρήνη

word.kjv: But the eyes of the wicked shall fail, and they shall not escape, and their hope shall be as the giving up of the ghost.
word.thailand: แต่ตาของคนชั่วร้ายจะมืดมัว เขาจะหลีกเลี่ยงหลบหนีไม่ได้ และความหวังของเขาจะเหมือนความตายนั่นเอง"
word.spanish1909: Mas los ojos de los malos se consumirán, Y no tendrán refugio; Y su esperanza será agonía del alma.
word.latinvulgate: Oculi autem impiorum deficient, et effugium peribit ab eis, et spes illorum abominatio animæ.
word.italian1927: Ma gli occhi degli empi verranno meno; non vi sarà più rifugio per loro, e non avranno altra speranza che di esalar l’anima".
word.german1912: Aber die Augen der Gottlosen werden verschmachten, und sie werden nicht entrinnen können; denn Hoffnung wird ihrer Seele fehlen.
word.french1910: Mais les yeux des méchants seront consumés; Pour eux point de refuge; La mort, voilà leur espérance!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但惡人的眼目必昏花，逃亡之路也必斷絕，他們的指望就是最後的一口氣。”
word.korean: 그러나 악한 자는 눈이 어두워서 도망할 곳을 찾지 못하리니 그의 소망은 기운이 끊침이리라
word.tagalog: Nguni't ang mga mata ng masama ay mangangalumata, at mawawalan sila ng daang tatakasan, at ang kanilang pagasa ay pagkalagot ng hininga.
word.maori: Ka poko ia nga kanohi o te hunga kino, kore ake he rerenga mo ratou; ko ta ratou e tumanako atu ai ko te hemonga.
word.cebuano: Apan ang mga mata sa mga malinapason makawang, Ug sila walay dalangpanan nga ilang pagakalagiwan; Ug ang ilang paglaum mao ang pagpanugyan sa espiritu.
word.hebrew: כ  ועיני רשעים תכלינה    ומנוס אבד מנהם ותקותם מפח-נפש
word.hebrewmodern: ועיני רשעים תכלינה ומנוס אבד מנהם ותקותם מפח נפש׃
word.greekot: σωτηρία δὲ αὐτοὺς ἀπολείψει ἡ γὰρ ἐλπὶς αὐτῶν ἀπώλεια ὀφθαλμοὶ δὲ ἀσεβῶν τακήσονται

word.kjv: For there is hope of a tree, if it be cut down, that it will sprout again, and that the tender branch thereof will not cease.
word.thailand: เพราะสำหรับต้นไม้ก็มีความหวัง ถ้ามันถูกตัดลง มันก็จะแตกหน่ออีก และหน่ออ่อนของมันจะไม่หยุดยั้ง
word.spanish1909: Porque si el árbol fuere cortado, aún queda de él esperanza; retoñecerá aún, Y sus renuevos no faltarán.
word.latinvulgate: Lignum habet spem : si præcisum fuerit, rursum virescit, et rami ejus pullulant.
word.italian1927: Per l’albero, almeno c’è speranza; se è tagliato, rigermoglia e continua a metter rampolli.
word.german1912: Ein Baum hat Hoffnung, wenn er schon abgehauen ist, daß er sich wieder erneue, und seine Schößlinge hören nicht auf.
word.french1910: Un arbre a de l'espérance: Quand on le coupe, il repousse, Il produit encore des rejetons;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 樹木常有希望，樹木若被砍下，也會再發芽，嫩枝仍生長不息。
word.korean: 나무는 소망이 있나니 찍힐지라도 다시 움이 나서 연한 가지가 끊이지 아니하며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't may pagasa sa isang punong kahoy, na kung ito'y putulin, ay sisibol uli, at ang sariwang sanga niyaon ay hindi maglilikat.
word.maori: ¶ Ka ai hoki he whakaaronga ki te rakau i tapahia, tera ano e pariri, e kore ano hoki e mutu te wana o tona pihi.
word.cebuano: Kay adunay kalauman sa usa ka kahoy, Kong kana pagaputlon aron nga manalingsing pag-usab, Ug nga ang diyutayng sanga niana dili mohunong.
word.hebrew: ז  כי יש לעץ    תקוה אם-יכרת ועוד יחליף    וינקתו לא תחדל
word.hebrewmodern: כי יש לעץ תקוה אם יכרת ועוד יחליף וינקתו לא תחדל׃
word.greekot: ἔστιν γὰρ δένδρῳ ἐλπίς ἐὰν γὰρ ἐκκοπῇ ἔτι ἐπανθήσει καὶ ὁ ῥάδαμνος αὐτοῦ οὐ μὴ ἐκλίπῃ

word.kjv: The waters wear the stones: thou washest away the things which grow out of the dust of the earth; and thou destroyest the hope of man.
word.thailand: น้ำเซาะหินไปเสีย พระองค์ทรงพัดพาสิ่งต่างๆที่งอกขึ้นจากผงคลีดินแห่งแผ่นดินโลกไป พระองค์ทรงทำลายความหวังของมนุษย์เช่นกัน
word.spanish1909: Las piedras son desgastadas con el agua impetuosa, Que se lleva el polvo de la tierra: de tal manera haces tú perecer la esperanza del hombre.
word.latinvulgate: lapides excavant aquæ, et alluvione paulatim terra consumitur : et hominem ergo similiter perdes.
word.italian1927: le acque rodono la pietra, le loro inondazioni trascinan via la terra: così tu distruggi la speranza dell’uomo.
word.german1912: Wasser wäscht Steine weg, und seine Fluten flößen die Erde weg: aber des Menschen Hoffnung ist verloren;
word.french1910: La pierre est broyée par les eaux, Et la terre emportée par leur courant; Ainsi tu détruis l'espérance de l'homme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 流水磨蝕石頭，水的氾溢沖去地上的塵土，你也這樣滅絕人的指望。
word.korean: 물은 돌을 닳게 하고 넘치는 물은 땅의 티끌을 씻어 버리나이다 이와 같이 주께서는 사람의 소망을 끊으시나이다
word.tagalog: Inuukit ng tubig ang mga bato; tinatangay ng mga baha niyaon ang alabok ng lupa: sa gayon iyong sinisira ang pagasa ng tao.
word.maori: E ngau ana te wai i nga kohatu; ma tona puhaketanga e horoi atu te puehu o te whenua; a whakangaromia iho e koe te tumanako a te tangata.
word.cebuano: Ang katubigan magahilis sa mga bato; Ang mga pag-awas niana magabugwas sa abug sa yuta: Maingon man niana ginalaglag mo ang paglaum sa tawo.
word.hebrew: יט  אבנים שחקו מים--    תשטף-ספיחיה עפר-ארץ ותקות אנוש    האבדת
word.hebrewmodern: אבנים שחקו מים תשטף ספיחיה עפר ארץ ותקות אנוש האבדת׃
word.greekot: λίθους ἐλέαναν ὕδατα καὶ κατέκλυσεν ὕδατα ὕπτια τοῦ χώματος τῆς γῆς καὶ ὑπομονὴν ἀνθρώπου ἀπώλεσας

word.kjv: And where is now my hope? as for my hope, who shall see it?
word.thailand: แล้วบัดนี้ความหวังของข้าอยู่ที่ไหนเล่า ส่วนความหวังของข้านั้นใครจะเห็นได้
word.spanish1909: ¿Dónde pues estará ahora mi esperanza? Y mi esperanza ¿quién la verá?
word.latinvulgate: Ubi est ergo nunc præstolatio mea ? et patientiam meam quis considerat ?
word.italian1927: dov’è dunque la mia speranza? questa speranza mia chi la può scorgere?
word.german1912: was soll ich denn harren? und wer achtet mein Hoffen?
word.french1910: Mon espérance, où donc est-elle? Mon espérance, qui peut la voir?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那麼，我的指望在哪裡呢？我的指望誰能看得見呢？
word.korean: 나의 소망이 어디 있으며 나의 소망을 누가 보겠느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Nasaan nga ang aking pagasa? At tungkol sa aking pagasa, sinong makakakita?
word.maori: Kei hea ra he tumanakohanga atu moku? A ko taku e tumanako atu ai ko wai e kite?
word.cebuano: Nan, hain man ang akong kalauman? Ug mahitungod sa akong paglaum, kinsa ang makakita niana?
word.hebrew: טו  ואיה אפו תקותי    ותקותי מי ישורנה
word.hebrewmodern: ואיה אפו תקותי ותקותי מי ישורנה׃
word.greekot: ποῦ οὖν μου ἔτι ἐστὶν ἡ ἐλπίς ἦ τὰ ἀγαθά μου ὄψομαι

word.kjv: He hath destroyed me on every side, and I am gone: and mine hope hath he removed like a tree.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงพังข้าลงเสียทุกด้านและข้าก็สิ้นไป พระองค์ทรงทึ้งความหวังของข้าขึ้นเหมือนถอนต้นไม้
word.spanish1909: Arruinóme por todos lados, y perezco; Y ha hecho pasar mi esperanza como árbol arrancado.
word.latinvulgate: Destruxit me undique, et pereo : et quasi evulsæ arbori abstulit spem meam.
word.italian1927: M’ha demolito a brano a brano, e io me ne vo! ha sradicata come un albero la mia speranza.
word.german1912: Er hat mich zerbrochen um und um und läßt mich gehen und hat ausgerissen meine Hoffnung wie einen Baum.
word.french1910: Il m'a brisé de toutes parts, et je m'en vais; Il a arraché mon espérance comme un arbre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他四面拆毀我，我就離世，他又把我這指望如樹枝一樣拔出來。
word.korean: 사면으로 나를 헐으시니 나는 죽었구나 내 소망을 나무 뽑듯 뽑으시고
word.tagalog: Kaniyang inilugmok ako sa bawa't dako, at ako'y nananaw: at ang aking pagasa ay binunot niyang parang punong kahoy.
word.maori: Wawahia ana ahau e ia i nga taha katoa, a riro ana ahau; ko taku i tumanako atu ai huaranga atu ana e ia ano he rakau.
word.cebuano: Iya akong gilumpag sa luyo ug luyo, ug ako tiwas na; Ug ang akong kalauman ingon sa usa ka kahoy nga iyang giluka.
word.hebrew: י  יתצני סביב ואלך    ויסע כעץ תקותי
word.hebrewmodern: יתצני סביב ואלך ויסע כעץ תקותי׃
word.greekot: διέσπασέν με κύκλῳ καὶ ᾠχόμην ἐξέκοψεν δὲ ὥσπερ δένδρον τὴν ἐλπίδα μου

word.kjv: For what is the hope of the hypocrite, though he hath gained, when God taketh away his soul?
word.thailand: เพราะอะไรจะเป็นความหวังของคนหน้าซื่อใจคด แม้ว่าเขาได้กำไรแล้ว เมื่อพระเจ้าทรงเอาชีวิตของเขาไป
word.spanish1909: Porque ¿cuál es la esperanza del hipócrita, por mucho que hubiere robado, Cuando Dios arrebatare su alma?
word.latinvulgate: Quæ est enim spes hypocritæ, si avare rapiat, et non liberet Deus animam ejus ?
word.italian1927: Quale speranza rimane mai all’empio quando Iddio gli toglie, gli rapisce l’anima?
word.german1912: Denn was ist die Hoffnung des Heuchlers, wenn Gott ein Ende mit ihm macht und seine Seele hinreißt?
word.french1910: Quelle espérance reste-t-il à l'impie, Quand Dieu coupe le fil de sa vie, Quand il lui retire son âme?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不敬虔的人沒有指望不敬虔的人被剪除，　神奪去他性命的時候還有甚麼指望呢？
word.korean: 사곡한 자가 이익을 얻었으나 하나님이 그 영혼을 취하실 때에는 무슨 소망이 있으랴
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ano ang pagasa ng di banal, bagaman siya'y makikinabang sa kaniya, pagka kinuha ng Dios ang kaniyang kaluluwa?
word.maori: He aha oti ta te whakaponokore e tumanako ai, ahakoa whiwhi ia i te rawa, ki te mea ka tangohia atu tona wairua e te Atua?
word.cebuano: Kay unsa man ang kalauman sa usa nga walay Dios, bisan pa makadawat siya ug ganancia, Kong ang Dios magakuha sa iyang kalag?
word.hebrew: ח  כי מה-תקות חנף כי יבצע    כי ישל אלוה נפשו
word.hebrewmodern: כי מה תקות חנף כי יבצע כי ישל אלוה נפשו׃
word.greekot: καὶ τίς γάρ ἐστιν ἐλπὶς ἀσεβεῖ ὅτι ἐπέχει πεποιθὼς ἐπὶ κύριον ἆρα σωθήσεται

word.kjv: If I have made gold my hope, or have said to the fine gold, Thou art my confidence;
word.thailand: ถ้าข้ากระทำให้ทองคำเป็นที่ไว้ใจหรือพูดกับทองคำเนื้อดีว่า `ท่านเป็นที่วางใจของข้า'
word.spanish1909: Si puse en oro mi esperanza, Y dije al oro: Mi confianza eres tú;
word.latinvulgate: Si putavi aurum robur meum, et obrizo dixi : Fiducia mea :
word.italian1927: Se ho riposto la mia fiducia nell’oro, se all’oro fino ho detto: "Tu sei la mia speranza",
word.german1912: Hab ich das Gold zu meiner Zuversicht gemacht und zu dem Goldklumpen gesagt: "Mein Trost"?
word.french1910: Si j'ai mis dans l'or ma confiance, Si j'ai dit à l'or: Tu es mon espoir;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我若以黃金為我所信靠的，又對精金說：‘你是我所靠賴的’；
word.korean: 내가 언제 금으로 내 소망을 삼고 정금더러 너는 내 의뢰하는 바라 하였던가
word.tagalog: Kung aking pinapaging ginto ang aking pagasa, at sinabi ko sa dalisay na ginto, ikaw ay aking tiwala;
word.maori: ¶ Ki te mea i u toku whakaaro ki te koura, a i mea ahau ki te koura parakore, Ko koe taku e whakawhirinaki atu ai;
word.cebuano: Kong ang bulawan maoy gihimo ko nga akong paglaum, Ug giingon ko ang bulawang lunsay: Ikaw mao man ang akong pagsalig;
word.hebrew: כד  אם-שמתי זהב כסלי    ולכתם אמרתי מבטחי
word.hebrewmodern: אם שמתי זהב כסלי ולכתם אמרתי מבטחי׃
word.greekot: εἰ ἔταξα χρυσίον ἰσχύν μου εἰ δὲ καὶ λίθῳ πολυτελεῖ ἐπεποίθησα

word.kjv: Behold, the hope of him is in vain: shall not one be cast down even at the sight of him?
word.thailand: ดูเถิด ความหวังของคนที่อาจสู้มันนั้นก็เป็นของเปล่า เมื่อเห็นมันเข้าเท่านั้น จะไม่ล้มลงหรือ
word.spanish1909: He aquí que la esperanza acerca de él será burlada; Porque aun á su sola vista se desmayarán.
word.latinvulgate: Sternutatio ejus splendor ignis, et oculi ejus ut palpebræ diluculi.
word.italian1927: (H41-1) Ecco, fallace è la speranza di chi l’assale; basta scorgerlo e s’è atterrati.
word.german1912: 40:1 Siehe, die Hoffnung wird jedem fehlen; schon wenn er seiner ansichtig wird, stürzt er zu Boden.
word.french1910: Voici, on est trompé dans son attente; A son seul aspect n'est-on pas terrassé?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 人希望捉住牠是徒然的，人一見牠，就心驚膽戰。（本節在《馬索拉抄本》為41:1）
word.korean: 이에 데만 사람 엘리바스와 수아 사람 빌닷과 나아마 사람 소발이 가서 여호와께서 자기들에게 명하신 대로 행하니라 여호와께서 욥을 기쁘게 받으셨더라
word.tagalog: Narito, ang pagasa riyan ay walang kabuluhan: hindi ba malulugmok ang sinoman makita lamang yaon?
word.maori: Nana, he hori kau te manako ki a ia: e kore ranei tetahi e hinga noa ki te kite kau atu i a ia?
word.cebuano: Ania karon, kawang lamang ang paglaum tungod kaniya; Dili ba kita matumba bisan na lamang sa pagtan-aw kaniya?
word.hebrew: ט  איש-באחיהו ידבקו    יתלכדו ולא יתפרדו
word.hebrewmodern: הן תחלתו נכזבה הגם אל מראיו יטל׃
word.greekot: ἀνὴρ τῷ ἀδελφῷ αὐτοῦ προσκολληθήσεται συνέχονται καὶ οὐ μὴ ἀποσπασθῶσιν

word.kjv: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.
word.thailand: เพราะฉะนั้นจิตใจของข้าพเจ้าจึงยินดีและจิตวิญญาณของข้าพเจ้าก็ปรีดา เนื้อหนังของข้าพเจ้าจะพักพิงอยู่ในความหวังใจด้วย
word.spanish1909: Alegróse por tanto mi corazón, y se gozó mi gloria: También mi carne reposará segura.
word.latinvulgate: a facie impiorum qui me afflixerunt. Inimici mei animam meam circumdederunt ;
word.italian1927: Perciò il mio cuore si rallegra e l’anima mia festeggia; anche la mia carne dimorerà al sicuro;
word.german1912: Darum freut sich mein Herz, und meine Ehre ist fröhlich; auch mein Fleisch wird sicher liegen.
word.french1910: Aussi mon coeur est dans la joie, mon esprit dans l'allégresse, Et mon corps repose en sécurité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 為此我的心快樂，我的靈（“靈”或譯：“榮耀”或“肝”；與30:12，57:8，108:1同）歡欣，我的肉身也必安然居住。
word.korean: 이러므로 내 마음이 기쁘고 내 영광도 즐거워하며 내 육체도 안전히 거하리니
word.tagalog: Kaya't ang aking puso ay masaya, at ang aking kaluwalhatian ay nagagalak: ang akin namang katawan ay tatahang tiwasay.
word.maori: Koia i koa ai toku ngakau, i whakamanamana ai toku kororia, i takoto tumanako ai ano oku kikokiko.
word.cebuano: Busa nagamaya ang akong kasingkasing, ug nagakalipay ang akong himaya: Ang akong unod usab magapuyo sa kasigurohan.
word.hebrew: ט  לכן שמח לבי--ויגל כבודי    אף-בשרי ישכן לבטח
word.hebrewmodern: לכן שמח לבי ויגל כבודי אף בשרי ישכן לבטח׃
word.greekot: ἀπὸ προσώπου ἀσεβῶν τῶν ταλαιπωρησάντων με οἱ ἐχθροί μου τὴν ψυχήν μου περιέσχον

word.kjv: But thou art he that took me out of the womb: thou didst make me hope when I was upon my mother's breasts.
word.thailand: ถึงกระนั้นพระองค์ก็ทรงเป็นผู้นำข้าพระองค์ออกมาจากครรภ์มารดา และทรงให้ข้าพระองค์มีความหวังใจเมื่ออยู่ที่อกแม่
word.spanish1909: Empero tú eres el que me sacó del vientre, El que me haces esperar desde que estaba á los pechos de mi madre.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Sì, tu sei quello che m’hai tratto dal seno materno; m’hai fatto riposar fidente sulle mammelle di mia madre.
word.german1912: Denn du hast mich aus meiner Mutter Leib gezogen; du warst meine Zuversicht, da ich noch an meiner Mutter Brüsten war.
word.french1910: Oui, tu m'as fait sortir du sein maternel, Tu m'as mis en sûreté sur les mamelles de ma mère;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 然而，是你使我從母腹中出來的；我在母親的懷裡，你就使我有倚靠的心。
word.korean: 오직 주께서 나를 모태에서 나오게 하시고 내 모친의 젖을 먹을때에 의지하게 하셨나이다
word.tagalog: Nguni't ikaw ang naglabas sa akin sa bahay-bata: Pinatiwala mo ako nang ako'y nasa mga suso ng aking ina.
word.maori: Nau ia ahau i whakawhanau mai i roto i te kopu, i mea hoki kia tumanako, i ahau i nga u o toku whaea.
word.cebuano: Apan ikaw mao ang nagkuha kanako gikan sa tagoangkan; Ikaw ang nagpasalig kanako sa diha pa ako sa mga suso sa akong inahan.
word.hebrew: ט  גל אל-יהוה יפלטהו    יצילהו כי חפץ בו
word.hebrewmodern: כי אתה גחי מבטן מבטיחי על שדי אמי׃

word.kjv: Be of good courage, and he shall strengthen your heart, all ye that hope in the LORD.
word.thailand: จงเข้มแข็ง และพระองค์จะให้ใจของท่านกล้าหาญเถิด ท่านทั้งปวงผู้หวังใจในพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Esforzaos todos vosotros los que esperáis en Jehová, Y tome vuestro corazón aliento.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Siate saldi, e il vostro cuore si fortifichi, o voi tutti che sperate nell’Eterno!
word.german1912: Seid getrost und unverzagt, alle, die ihr des HERRN harret!
word.french1910: Fortifiez-vous et que votre coeur s'affermisse, Vous tous qui espérez en l'Eternel!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 所有仰望耶和華的人，你們都要剛強，堅固你們的心。
word.korean: 강하고 담대하라 여호와를 바라는 너희들아 !
word.tagalog: Kayo'y mangagpakalakas, at mangagdalang tapang ang inyong puso, kayong lahat na nagsisiasa sa Panginoon.
word.maori: Kia maia, kia kaha o koutou ngakau, e te hunga katoa e tumanako ana ki a Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Magmalig-on kamo, ug padasiga ang inyong kasingkasing, Ngatanan kamo nga may paglaum kang Jehova.
word.hebrew: כד  אהבו את-יהוה    כל-חסידיו אמונים נצר יהוה    ומשלם על-יתר עשה גאוה [ (Psalms 31:25) כה  חזקו ויאמץ לבבכם--    כל-המיחלים ליהוה ]
word.hebrewmodern: חזקו ויאמץ לבבכם כל המיחלים ליהוה׃

word.kjv: Behold, the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระเนตรของพระเยโฮวาห์อยู่เหนือผู้ที่ยำเกรงพระองค์ เหนือผู้ที่หวังในความเมตตาของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: He aquí, el ojo de Jehová sobre los que le temen, Sobre los que esperan en su misericordia;
word.latinvulgate: Clamaverunt justi, et Dominus exaudivit eos ; et ex omnibus tribulationibus eorum liberavit eos.
word.italian1927: Ecco, l’occhio dell’Eterno è su quelli che lo temono, su quelli che sperano nella sua benignità,
word.german1912: Siehe, des HERRN Auge sieht auf die, so ihn fürchten, die auf seine Güte hoffen,
word.french1910: Voici, l'oeil de l'Eternel est sur ceux qui le craignent, Sur ceux qui espèrent en sa bonté,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的眼睛看顧敬畏他的人，和那些仰望他慈愛的人；
word.korean: 여호와는 그 경외하는 자 곧 그 인자하심을 바라는 자를 살피사
word.tagalog: Narito, ang mata ng Panginoon ay nasa kanila na nangatatakot sa kaniya, sa kanila na nagsisiasa sa kaniyang kagandahang-loob;
word.maori: Nana, kei runga i te hunga e wehi ana i a ia te kanohi o Ihowa, kei te hunga e tumanako ana ki tana mahi tohu;
word.cebuano: Ania karon, ang mata ni Jehova anaa sa ibabaw sa mga nagakahadlok kaniya, Sa ibabaw sa mga nagasalig sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot;
word.hebrew: יח  הנה עין יהוה אל-יראיו    למיחלים לחסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הנה עין יהוה אל יראיו למיחלים לחסדו׃
word.greekot: ἐκέκραξαν οἱ δίκαιοι καὶ ὁ κύριος εἰσήκουσεν αὐτῶν καὶ ἐκ πασῶν τῶν θλίψεων αὐτῶν ἐρρύσατο αὐτούς

word.kjv: Let thy mercy, O LORD, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอความเมตตาของพระองค์จงอยู่เหนือข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายตามที่ข้าพระองค์หวังใจในพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Sea tu misericordia, oh Jehová, sobre nosotros, Como esperamos en ti.
word.latinvulgate: Mors peccatorum pessima ; et qui oderunt justum delinquent.
word.italian1927: La tua benignità, o Eterno, sia sopra noi, poiché noi abbiamo sperato in te.
word.german1912: Deine Güte, HERR, sei über uns, wie wir auf dich hoffen.
word.french1910: Eternel! que ta grâce soit sur nous, Comme nous espérons en toi!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！求你照著我們所仰望你的，向我們施慈愛。
word.korean: 여호와여, 우리가 주께 바라는 대로 주의 인자하심을 우리에게 베푸소서
word.tagalog: Sumaamin nawa ang iyong kagandahang-loob, Oh Panginoon, ayon sa aming pagasa sa iyo.
word.maori: E Ihowa, hei runga i a matou tau mahi tohu; kia rite hoki ki ta matou tumanako ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Ibutang sa ibabaw namo ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot, Oh Jehova, Sumala sa among paglaum kanimo.
word.hebrew: כב  יהי-חסדך יהוה עלינו    כאשר יחלנו לך
word.hebrewmodern: יהי חסדך יהוה עלינו כאשר יחלנו לך׃
word.greekot: θάνατος ἁμαρτωλῶν πονηρός καὶ οἱ μισοῦντες τὸν δίκαιον πλημμελήσουσιν

word.kjv: For in thee, O LORD, do I hope: thou wilt hear, O Lord my God.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ แต่ข้าพระองค์หวังใจในพระองค์ ข้าแต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าพระเจ้าของข้าพระองค์คือพระองค์ผู้ที่จะทรงฟังข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque á ti, oh Jehová, esperé yo: Tú responderás, Jehová Dios mío.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Poiché, in te io spero, o Eterno; tu risponderai, o Signore, Iddio mio!
word.german1912: Aber ich harre, HERR, auf dich; du, HERR, mein Gott, wirst erhören.
word.french1910: Eternel! c'est en toi que j'espère; Tu répondras, Seigneur, mon Dieu!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！我等候你；主我的　神啊！你必應允我。
word.korean: 여호와여, 내가 주를 바랐사오니 내 주 하나님이 내게 응락하시리이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't sa iyo, Oh Panginoon ay umaasa ako: ikaw ay sasagot, Oh Panginoon kong Dios.
word.maori: E tumanako nei hoki ahau ki a koe, e Ihowa: ka whakahoki kupu mai ano koe, e te Ariki, e toku Atua.
word.cebuano: Kay kanimo, Oh Jehova, nagalaum ako: Ikaw magatubag, Oh Ginoo, Dios ko.
word.hebrew: טו  ואהי--כאיש אשר לא-שמע    ואין בפיו תוכחות
word.hebrewmodern: כי לך יהוה הוחלתי אתה תענה אדני אלהי׃

word.kjv: And now, Lord, what wait I for? my hope is in thee.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า บัดนี้ข้าพระองค์จะรอคอยอะไร ความหวังของข้าพระองค์อยู่ในพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Y ahora, Señor, ¿qué esperaré? Mi esperanza en ti está.
word.latinvulgate: Sacrificium et oblationem noluisti ; aures autem perfecisti mihi. Holocaustum et pro peccato non postulasti ;
word.italian1927: E ora, o Signore, che aspetto? La mia speranza è in te.
word.german1912: Nun, HERR, wes soll ich mich trösten? Ich hoffe auf dich.
word.french1910: Maintenant, Seigneur, que puis-je espérer? En toi est mon espérance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 主啊！現在我還等候甚麼呢？我的指望在乎你。
word.korean: 주여, 내가 무엇을 바라리요 나의 소망은 주께 있나이다
word.tagalog: At ngayon, Panginoon, ano pa ang aking hinihintay? Ang aking pagasa ay nasa iyo.
word.maori: ¶ Na he aha taku e tatari atu nei, e te Ariki? Ko koe taku e tumanako ai.
word.cebuano: Ug karon, Ginoo, unsa ba ang ginapaabut ko! Ang akong paglaum anaa kanimo.
word.hebrew: ז  אך-בצלם יתהלך-איש--    אך-הבל יהמיון יצבר    ולא-ידע מי-אספם
word.hebrewmodern: ועתה מה קויתי אדני תוחלתי לך היא׃
word.greekot: θυσίαν καὶ προσφορὰν οὐκ ἠθέλησας ὠτία δὲ κατηρτίσω μοι ὁλοκαύτωμα καὶ περὶ ἁμαρτίας οὐκ ᾔτησας

word.kjv: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted in me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him for the help of his countenance.
word.thailand: จิตใจของข้าพเจ้าเอ๋ย ไฉนเจ้าจึงฝ่ออยู่ ไฉนเจ้าจึงกระสับกระส่ายอยู่ในข้าพเจ้า เจ้าจงหวังใจในพระเจ้า เพราะข้าพเจ้าจะยังคงสรรเสริญพระองค์สำหรับความช่วยเหลือที่มาจากพระพักตร์ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: ¿Por qué te abates, oh alma mía, Y te conturbas en mí? Espera á Dios; porque aun le tengo de alabar Por las saludes de su presencia.
word.latinvulgate: Quare tristis es, anima mea ? et quare conturbas me ? Spera in Deo, quoniam adhuc confitebor illi, salutare vultus mei, et Deus meus.
word.italian1927: Perché t’abbatti anima mia? perché ti commuovi in me? Spera in Dio, perch’io lo celebrerò ancora; egli è la mia salvezza e il mio Dio.
word.german1912: Was betrübst du dich, meine Seele, und bist so unruhig in mir? Harre auf Gott! denn ich werde ihm noch danken, daß er mir hilft mit seinem Angesicht.
word.french1910: Pourquoi t'abats-tu, mon âme, et gémis-tu au dedans de moi? Espère en Dieu, car je le louerai encore; Il est mon salut et mon Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的心哪！你為甚麼沮喪呢？為甚麼在我裡面不安呢？應當等候　神；因為我還要稱讚他，他是我面前的救助、我的　神。
word.korean: 내 영혼아 ! 네가 어찌하여 낙망하며 어찌하여 내 속에서 불안하여 하는고 너는 하나님을 바라라 ! 그 얼굴의 도우심을 인하여 내가 오히려 찬송하리로다
word.tagalog: Bakit ka nanglulumo, Oh kaluluwa ko? At bakit ka nababagabag sa loob ko? Umasa ka sa Dios: sapagka't pupuri pa ako sa kaniya dahil sa kagalingan ng kaniyang mukha.
word.maori: He aha koe i piko ai, e toku wairua? i ohorere ai i roto i ahau? Tumanako ki te Atua; tera ano ahau e whakawhetai ki a ia, mo te ora o tona mata.
word.cebuano: Ngano nga nagasubo ka, Oh kalag ko? Ug ngano nga nagubot ikaw sa sulod nako? Lumaum ka sa Dios; kay magadayeg pa ako kaniya Tungod sa panabang sa iyang nawong.
word.hebrew: ה  אלה אזכרה    ואשפכה עלי נפשי-- כי אעבר בסך    אדדם עד-בית אלהים בקול-רנה ותודה    המון חוגג
word.hebrewmodern: מה תשתוחחי נפשי ותהמי עלי הוחילי לאלהים כי עוד אודנו ישועות פניו׃
word.greekot: ἵνα τί περίλυπος εἶ ψυχή καὶ ἵνα τί συνταράσσεις με ἔλπισον ἐπὶ τὸν θεόν ὅτι ἐξομολογήσομαι αὐτῷ σωτήριον τοῦ προσώπου μου ὁ θεός μου

word.kjv: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him, who is the health of my countenance, and my God.
word.thailand: จิตใจของข้าพเจ้าเอ๋ย ไฉนเจ้าจึงฝ่ออยู่ ไฉนเจ้าจึงกระสับกระส่ายอยู่ในข้าพเจ้า เจ้าจงหวังใจในพระเจ้า เพราะข้าพเจ้าจะยังคงสรรเสริญพระองค์ ผู้ทรงเป็นสวัสดิภาพแห่งสีหน้าของข้าพเจ้า และพระเจ้าของข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: ¿Por qué te abates, oh alma mía, Y por qué te conturbas en mí? Espera á Dios; porque aun le tengo de alabar; Es él salvamento delante de mí, y el Dios mío.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Perché t’abbatti anima mia? perché ti commuovi in me? Spera in Dio, perché lo celebrerò ancora; egli è la mia salvezza e il mio Dio.
word.german1912: Was betrübst du dich, meine Seele, und bist so unruhig in mir? Harre auf Gott! denn ich werde ihm noch danken, daß er meines Angesichts Hilfe und mein Gott ist.
word.french1910: Pourquoi t'abats-tu, mon âme, et gémis-tu au dedans de moi? Espère en Dieu, car je le louerai encore; Il est mon salut et mon Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的心哪！你為甚麼沮喪呢？為甚麼在我裡面不安呢？應當等候　神；因為我還要稱讚他，他是我面前的救助、我的　神。
word.korean: 내 영혼아 ! 네가 어찌하여 낙망하며 어찌하여 내 속에서 불안하여 하는고 너는 하나님을 바라라 ! 나는 내 얼굴을 도우시는 내 하나님을 오히려 찬송하리로다
word.tagalog: Bakit ka nanglulumo, Oh kaluluwa ko? At bakit ka nababagabag sa loob ko? Umasa ka sa Dios: sapagka't pupuri pa ako sa kaniya, na siyang kagalingan ng aking mukha, at aking Dios.
word.maori: He aha koe i piko ai, e toku wairua? He aha koe i ohorere ai i roto i ahau? Tumanako ki te Atua: tera ano ahau e whakawhetai ki a ia, ko te ora nei ia o toku mata, ko toku Atua.
word.cebuano: Ngano nga nagsubo ka, Oh kalag ko? Ug ngano nga nagubot ka sa sulod nako? Lumaum ka sa Dios; kay magadayeg pa ako kaniya, Nga mao ang panabang sa akong nawong, ug ang akong Dios.
word.hebrew: יא  ברצח בעצמותי--    חרפוני צוררי באמרם אלי כל-היום    איה אלהיך [ (Psalms 42:12) יב  מה-תשתוחחי נפשי--    ומה-תהמי עלי הוחילי לאלהים כי-עוד אודנו--    ישועת פני ואלהי ]
word.hebrewmodern: מה תשתוחחי נפשי ומה תהמי עלי הוחילי לאלהים כי עוד אודנו ישועת פני ואלהי׃

word.kjv: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope in God: for I shall yet praise him, who is the health of my countenance, and my God.
word.thailand: จิตใจของข้าพเจ้าเอ๋ย ไฉนเจ้าจึงฝ่ออยู่ ไฉนเจ้าจึงกระสับกระส่ายอยู่ในข้าพเจ้า จงหวังใจในพระเจ้า เพราะข้าพเจ้าจะยังคงสรรเสริญพระองค์ ผู้ทรงเป็นสวัสดิภาพแห่งสีหน้าของข้าพเจ้า และพระเจ้าของข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: ¿Por qué te abates, oh alma mía, Y por qué te conturbes en mí? Espera á Dios; porque aun le tengo de alabar; Es él salvamento delante de mí, y el Dios mío.
word.latinvulgate: Tu es ipse rex meus et Deus meus, qui mandas salutes Jacob.
word.italian1927: Perché t’abbatti anima mia? perché ti commuovi in me? Spera in Dio, perché lo celebrerò ancora; egli è la mia salvezza ed il mio Dio.
word.german1912: Was betrübst du dich, meine Seele, und bist so unruhig in mir? Harre auf Gott! denn ich werde ihm noch danken, daß er meines Angesichts Hilfe und mein Gott ist.
word.french1910: Pourquoi t'abats-tu, mon âme, et gémis-tu au dedans de moi? Espère en Dieu, car je le louerai encore; Il est mon salut et mon Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的心哪！你為甚麼沮喪呢？為甚麼在我裡面不安呢？應當等候　神；因為我還要稱讚他，他是我面前的救助、我的　神。
word.korean: 내 영혼아 ! 네가 어찌하여 낙망하며 어찌하여 내 속에서 불안하여 하는고 너는 하나님을 바라라 ! 나는 내 얼굴을 도우시는 내 하나님을 오히려 찬송하리로다
word.tagalog: Bakit ka nanglulumo, Oh kaluluwa ko? At bakit ka nababagabag sa loob ko? Umasa ka sa Dios: sapagka't pupuri pa ako sa kaniya, na siyang kagalingan ng aking mukha, at aking Dios.
word.maori: He aha koe i piko ai, e toku wairua? He aha koe i ohorere ai i roto i ahau? Tumanako ki te Atua: tera ano ahau e whakawhetai ki a ia, ko te ora nei ia o toku mata, ko toku Atua.
word.cebuano: Ngano nga nagasubo ka, Oh kalag ko? Lumaum ka sa Dios; kay magadayeg pa ako kaniya, Nga mao ang panabang sa akong nawong, ug ang akong Dios.
word.hebrew: ה  מה-תשתוחחי נפשי--    ומה-תהמי עלי הוחילי לאלהים כי-עוד אודנו--    ישועת פני ואלהי
word.hebrewmodern: מה תשתוחחי נפשי ומה תהמי עלי הוחילי לאלהים כי עוד אודנו ישועת פני ואלהי׃
word.greekot: σὺ εἶ αὐτὸς ὁ βασιλεύς μου καὶ ὁ θεός μου ὁ ἐντελλόμενος τὰς σωτηρίας ιακωβ

word.kjv: For thou art my hope, O Lord GOD: thou art my trust from my youth.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าพระเจ้า เพราะพระองค์ทรงเป็นความหวังของข้าพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงเป็นที่วางใจของข้าพระองค์ตั้งแต่เด็กๆมา
word.spanish1909: Porque tú, oh Señor Jehová, eres mi esperanza: Seguridad mía desde mi juventud.
word.latinvulgate: Et permanebit cum sole, et ante lunam, in generatione et generationem.
word.italian1927: Poiché tu sei la mia speranza, o Signore, o Eterno, la mia fiducia fin dalla mia fanciullezza.
word.german1912: Denn du bist meine Zuversicht, HERR HERR, meine Hoffnung von meiner Jugend an.
word.french1910: Car tu es mon espérance, Seigneur Eternel! En toi je me confie dès ma jeunesse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為你是我的盼望；主耶和華啊！你是我自幼以來所倚靠的。
word.korean: 주 여호와여, 주는 나의 소망이시요 나의 어릴 때부터 의지시라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ikaw ay aking pagasa, Oh Panginoong Dios: ikaw ay aking tiwala mula sa aking kabataan.
word.maori: Ko koe nei hoki, e te Ariki, e Ihowa, taku e tumanako atu nei, taku e whakawhirinaki nei no toku tamarikitanga ake ano.
word.cebuano: Kay ikaw ang akong paglaum, Oh Ginoong Jehova: Ikaw mao ang akong pagsalig sukad pa sa akong pagkabatan-on.
word.hebrew: ה  כי-אתה תקותי    אדני יהוה מבטחי מנעורי
word.hebrewmodern: כי אתה תקותי אדני יהוה מבטחי מנעורי׃
word.greekot: καὶ συμπαραμενεῖ τῷ ἡλίῳ καὶ πρὸ τῆς σελήνης γενεὰς γενεῶν

word.kjv: But I will hope continually, and will yet praise thee more and more.
word.thailand: แต่ข้าพระองค์จะหวังอยู่ตลอดไป และจะสรรเสริญพระองค์มากยิ่งขึ้นๆ
word.spanish1909: Mas yo siempre esperaré, Y añadiré sobre toda tu alabanza.
word.latinvulgate: Ex usuris et iniquitate redimet animas eorum, et honorabile nomen eorum coram illo.
word.italian1927: Ma io spererò del continuo, e a tutte le tue lodi ne aggiungerò delle altre.
word.german1912: Ich aber will immer harren und will immer deines Ruhmes mehr machen.
word.french1910: Et moi, j'espérerai toujours, Je te louerai de plus en plus.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 至於我，我要常常仰望你，要多多讚美你。
word.korean: 나는 항상 소망을 품고 주를 더욱 찬송하리이다
word.tagalog: Nguni't ako'y maghihintay na palagi, at pupuri pa ako sa iyo ng higit at higit.
word.maori: ¶ Ko ahau ia, ka tumanako tonu: ka hono tonu ano te whakamoemiti ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Apan ako magapadayon sa paglaum, Ug magadugang gayud ang akong pagdayeg kanimo.
word.hebrew: יד  ואני תמיד איחל    והוספתי על-כל-תהלתך
word.hebrewmodern: ואני תמיד איחל והוספתי על כל תהלתך׃
word.greekot: ἐκ τόκου καὶ ἐξ ἀδικίας λυτρώσεται τὰς ψυχὰς αὐτῶν καὶ ἔντιμον τὸ ὄνομα αὐτῶν ἐνώπιον αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: That they might set their hope in God, and not forget the works of God, but keep his commandments:
word.thailand: เพื่อเขาจะตั้งความหวังของเขาไว้ในพระเจ้า และไม่ลืมพระราชกิจของพระเจ้า แต่รักษาพระบัญญัติของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: A fin de que pongan en Dios su confianza, Y no se olviden de las obras de Dios, Y guarden sus mandamientos:
word.latinvulgate: quia comederunt Jacob, et locum ejus desolaverunt.
word.italian1927: ond’essi ponessero in Dio la loro speranza e non dimenticassero le opere di Dio, ma osservassero i suoi comandamenti;
word.german1912: daß sie setzten auf Gott ihre Hoffnung und nicht vergäßen der Taten Gottes und seine Gebote hielten
word.french1910: Afin qu'ils missent en Dieu leur confiance, Qu'ils n'oubliassent pas les oeuvres de Dieu, Et qu'ils observassent ses commandements,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 使他們信靠　神，不忘記　神的作為，謹守他的誡命；
word.korean: 저희로 그 소망을 하나님께 두며 하나님의 행사를 잊지 아니하고 오직 그 계명을 지켜서
word.tagalog: Upang kanilang mailagak ang kanilang pagasa sa Dios, at huwag kalimutan ang mga gawa ng Dios, Kundi ingatan ang kaniyang mga utos:
word.maori: Kia u ai ta ratou tumanako ki te Atua, kei wareware hoki ki nga mahi a te Atua: engari kia mau ki ana whakahau.
word.cebuano: Aron nga ibutang nila ang ilang paglaum sa Dios. Ug dili mahakalimot sa mga buhat sa Dios, Kondili magabantay sa iyang mga sugo,
word.hebrew: ז  וישימו באלהים כסלם    ולא ישכחו מעללי-אל ומצותיו ינצרו
word.hebrewmodern: וישימו באלהים כסלם ולא ישכחו מעללי אל ומצותיו ינצרו׃
word.greekot: ὅτι κατέφαγον τὸν ιακωβ καὶ τὸν τόπον αὐτοῦ ἠρήμωσαν

word.kjv: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; for I have hoped in thy judgments.
word.thailand: ขออย่าทรงนำพระวจนะแห่งความจริงออกไปจากปากข้าพระองค์อย่างสิ้นเชิง เพราะความหวังของข้าพระองค์อยู่ในคำตัดสินของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Y no quites de mi boca en nigún tiempo la palabra de verdad; Porque á tu juicio espero.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Non mi toglier del tutto dalla bocca la parola della verità, perché spero nei tuoi giudizi.
word.german1912: Und nimm ja nicht von meinem Munde das Wort der Wahrheit; denn ich hoffe auf deine Rechte.
word.french1910: N'ôte pas entièrement de ma bouche la parole de la vérité! Car j'espère en tes jugements.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你使真理的話總不離開我的口，因為我仰望你的典章。
word.korean: 내 대적이 주의 말씀을 잊어버렸으므로 내 열성이 나를 소멸하였나이다
word.tagalog: At huwag mong lubos na kunin ang salita ng katotohanan sa aking bibig; sapagka't ako'y umasa sa iyong mga kahatulan.
word.maori: ¶ Kaua e tangohia rawatia i toku mangai te kupu o te pono: e tumanako nei hoki ahau ki au whakaritenga.
word.cebuano: Ug ayaw pagkuhaa sa tuman ang pulong sa kamatuoran gikan sa akong baba; Kay ako milaum diha sa imong mga tulomanon.
word.hebrew: מג  ואל-תצל מפי דבר-אמת עד-מאד    כי למשפטך יחלתי
word.hebrewmodern: ואל תצל מפי דבר אמת עד מאד כי למשפטך יחלתי׃

word.kjv: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.
word.thailand: ขอทรงระลึกถึงพระวจนะของพระองค์ที่มีต่อผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์ ซึ่งพระองค์ทรงกระทำให้ข้าพระองค์หวังอยู่นั้น
word.spanish1909: ZAYIN. Acuérdate de la palabra dada á tu siervo, En la cual me has hecho esperar.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Ricordati della parola detta al tuo servitore; su di essa m’hai fatto sperare.
word.german1912: Gedenke deinem Knechte an dein Wort, auf welches du mich lässest hoffen.
word.french1910: Souviens-toi de ta promesse à ton serviteur, Puisque tu m'as donné l'espérance!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神的話滿有盼望安慰求你記念你向你僕人應許的話，因為你使我有盼望。
word.korean: 내가 주의 계명을 사모하므로 입을 열고 헐떡였나이다
word.tagalog: Iyong alalahanin ang salita sa iyong lingkod, na doo'y iyong pinaasa ako.
word.maori: ¶ Maharatia te kupu ki tau pononga, no te mea kua meinga ahau e koe kia tumanako atu.
word.cebuano: Hinumdumi ang pulong nga gihatag mo sa imong alagad, Tungod kay imo akong gipalaum.
word.hebrew: מט  זכר-דבר לעבדך--    על אשר יחלתני
word.hebrewmodern: זכר דבר לעבדך על אשר יחלתני׃

word.kjv: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; because I have hoped in thy word.
word.thailand: บรรดาผู้เกรงกลัวพระองค์จะเห็นข้าพระองค์และเปรมปรีดิ์ เพราะว่าข้าพระองค์ได้หวังในพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Los que te temen, me verán, y se alegrarán; Porque en tu palabra he esperado.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Quelli che ti temono mi vedranno e si rallegreranno, perché ho sperato nella tua parola.
word.german1912: Die dich fürchten, sehen mich und freuen sich; denn ich hoffe auf dein Wort.
word.french1910: Ceux qui te craignent me voient et se réjouissent, Car j'espère en tes promesses.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願敬畏你的人看見我就歡喜，因為我仰望你的話。
word.korean: 악을 좇는 자가 가까이 왔사오니 저희는 주의 법에서 머니이다
word.tagalog: Silang nangatatakot sa iyo ay makikita ako, at matutuwa; sapagka't ako'y umasa sa iyong salita;
word.maori: ¶ Ka hari te hunga e wehi ana i a koe ina kite i ahau: noku i tumanako ki tau kupu.
word.cebuano: Sila nga may mga kahadlok kanimo motan-aw kanako ug managkalipay, Kay diha sa imong pulong milaum ako.
word.hebrew: עד  יראיך יראוני וישמחו    כי לדברך יחלתי
word.hebrewmodern: יראיך יראוני וישמחו כי לדברך יחלתי׃

word.kjv: My soul fainteth for thy salvation: but I hope in thy word.
word.thailand: จิตใจของข้าพระองค์อ่อนระโหยคอยความรอดของพระองค์ แต่ข้าพระองค์หวังในพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: KAF. Desfallece mi alma por tu salud, Esperando en tu palabra.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: L’anima mia vien meno bramando la tua salvezza; io spero nella tua parola.
word.german1912: Meine Seele verlangt nach deinem Heil; ich hoffe auf dein Wort.
word.french1910: Mon âme languit après ton salut; J'espère en ta promesse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 逼迫中仍謹記　神律例我渴望你的救恩以致心力衰竭，但我仍仰望你的話。
word.korean: 주의 법을 사랑하는 자에게는 큰 평안이 있으니 저희에게 장애물이 없으리이다
word.tagalog: Pinanglulupaypayan ng aking kaluluwa ang iyong pagliligtas: nguni't umaasa ako sa iyong salita.
word.maori: ¶ E matenui ana toku wairua ki tau whakaoranga: otiia ka tumanako ahau ki tau kupu.
word.cebuano: Nangandoy ang akong kalag tungod sa imong kaluwasan; Apan milaum ako sa imong pulong.
word.hebrew: פא  כלתה לתשועתך נפשי    לדברך יחלתי
word.hebrewmodern: כלתה לתשועתך נפשי לדברך יחלתי׃

word.kjv: Thou art my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงเป็นที่ซ่อนและเป็นโล่ของข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์หวังในพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Mi escondedero y mi escudo eres tú: En tu palabra he esperado.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Tu sei il mio rifugio ed il mio scudo; io spero nella tua parola.
word.german1912: Du bist mein Schirm und Schild; ich hoffe auf dein Wort.
word.french1910: Tu es mon asile et mon bouclier; J'espère en ta promesse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你是我的避難所，我的盾牌；我仰望你的話。
word.korean: 내 눈을 돌이켜 허탄한 것을 보지 말게 하시고 주의 도에 나를 소성케 하소서
word.tagalog: Ikaw ang kublihan kong dako at kalasag ko: ako'y umaasa sa iyong salita.
word.maori: ¶ Ko toku piringa koe, ko toku whakangungu rakau: e tumanako ana ahau ki tau kupu.
word.cebuano: Ikaw mao ang akong dapit nga dalangpanan ug ang akong taming: Sa imong pulong nagalaum ako.
word.hebrew: קיד  סתרי ומגני אתה    לדברך יחלתי
word.hebrewmodern: סתרי ומגני אתה לדברך יחלתי׃

word.kjv: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.
word.thailand: ขอทรงประคองข้าพระองค์ไว้ตามพระดำรัสของพระองค์ เพื่อข้าพระองค์จะเป็นอยู่ และอย่าให้ข้าพระองค์ขายหน้าในความหวังของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Susténtame conforme á tu palabra, y viviré: Y no me avergüences de mi esperanza.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Sostienmi secondo la tua parola, ond’io viva, e non rendermi confuso nella mia speranza.
word.german1912: Erhalte mich durch dein Wort, daß ich lebe; und laß mich nicht zu Schanden werden über meiner Hoffnung.
word.french1910: Soutiens-moi selon ta promesse, afin que je vive, Et ne me rends point confus dans mon espérance!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你照著你的應許扶持我，使我存活；不要使我因仰望你而蒙羞。
word.korean: 나의 두려워하는 훼방을 내게서 떠나게 하소서 주의 규례는 선하심이니이다
word.tagalog: Alalayan mo ako ayon sa iyong salita, upang ako'y mabuhay; at huwag mo akong hiyain sa aking pagasa.
word.maori: ¶ Kia rite ki tau kupu tau tautoko ake i ahau, kia ora ai ahau: kaua hoki ahau e tukua kia whakama ki taku e tumanako atu nei.
word.cebuano: Sapnaya ako sumala sa imong pulong, aron ako mabuhi; Ug ayaw ako pagpakaulawi sa akong paglaum.
word.hebrew: קטז  סמכני כאמרתך ואחיה    ואל-תבישני משברי
word.hebrewmodern: סמכני כאמרתך ואחיה ואל תבישני משברי׃

word.kjv: I prevented the dawning of the morning, and cried: I hoped in thy word.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์ตื่นขึ้นก่อนอรุณ ทูลขอความช่วยเหลือ ข้าพระองค์หวังอยู่ในพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Anticipéme al alba, y clamé: Esperé en tu palabra.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io prevengo l’alba e grido; io spero nella tua parola.
word.german1912: Ich komme in der Frühe und schreie; auf dein Wort hoffe ich.
word.french1910: Je devance l'aurore et je crie; J'espère en tes promesses.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 天還未亮我就呼求救助，我所仰望的就是你的話。
word.korean: 저희 마음은 살쪄 지방 같으나 나는 주의 법을 즐거워하나이다
word.tagalog: Ako'y nagpauna sa bukang-liwayway ng umaga, at dumaing ako: ako'y umasa sa iyong mga salita.
word.maori: ¶ Kiano te ata i puao noa, kua karanga ahau: i tumanako ahau ki au kupu.
word.cebuano: Giunhan ko ang banag-banag sa kabuntagon, ug mitu-aw ako : Milaum ako diha sa imong mga pulong.
word.hebrew: קמז  קדמתי בנשף ואשועה    לדבריך (לדברך) יחלתי
word.hebrewmodern: קדמתי בנשף ואשועה לדבריך יחלתי׃

word.kjv: LORD, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ข้าพระองค์หวังในความรอดของพระองค์ และข้าพระองค์ทำตามพระบัญญัติของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Tu salud he esperado, oh Jehová; Y tus mandamientos he puesto por obra.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io ho sperato nella tua salvezza, o Eterno, e ho messo in pratica i tuoi comandamenti.
word.german1912: HERR, ich warte auf dein Heil und tue nach deinen Geboten.
word.french1910: J'espère en ton salut, ô Eternel! Et je pratique tes commandements.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！我要等候你的救恩，我要遵行你的命令。
word.korean: 여호와여, 주의 말씀이 영원히 하늘에 굳게 섰사오며
word.tagalog: Ako'y umasa sa iyong pagliligtas, Oh Panginoon. At ginawa ko ang mga utos mo.
word.maori: ¶ A kua tumanako ahau ki tau whakaora, e Ihowa, kua mahi ahau i au whakahau.
word.cebuano: Sa imong kaluwasan milaum ako, Oh Jehova, Ug nagtuman ako sa imong mga sugo.
word.hebrew: קסו  שברתי לישועתך יהוה    ומצותיך עשיתי
word.hebrewmodern: שברתי לישועתך יהוה ומצותיך עשיתי׃

word.kjv: I wait for the LORD, my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าคอยพระเยโฮวาห์ จิตใจของข้าพเจ้าคอยอยู่ และข้าพเจ้าหวังในพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Esperé yo á Jehová, esperó mi alma; En su palabra he esperado.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io aspetto l’Eterno, l’anima mia l’aspetta, ed io spero nella sua parola.
word.german1912: Ich harre des HERRN; meine Seele harret, und ich hoffe auf sein Wort.
word.french1910: J'espère en l'Eternel, mon âme espère, Et j'attends sa promesse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我等候耶和華，我的心等候他，我仰望他的話。
word.korean: 나 곧 내 영혼이 여호와를 기다리며 내가 그 말씀을 바라는도다
word.tagalog: Aking hinihintay ang Panginoon, hinihintay ng aking kaluluwa, at sa kaniyang salita ay umaasa ako.
word.maori: ¶ E tatari ana ahau ki a Ihowa; e tatari ana toku wairua: e tumanako ana hoki ahau ki tana kupu.
word.cebuano: Nagahulat ako kang Jehova, ang akong kalag nagahulat, Ug sa iyang pulong milaum ako.
word.hebrew: ה  קויתי יהוה קותה נפשי    ולדברו הוחלתי
word.hebrewmodern: קויתי יהוה קותה נפשי ולדברו הוחלתי׃

word.kjv: Let Israel hope in the LORD: for with the LORD there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.
word.thailand: จงให้อิสราเอลหวังใจในพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะในพระเยโฮวาห์มีความเมตตา และในพระองค์มีการไถ่อย่างสมบูรณ์
word.spanish1909: Espere Israel á Jehová; Porque en Jehová hay misericordia. Y abundante redención con él.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: O Israele, spera nell’Eterno, poiché presso l’Eterno è benignità e presso di lui è abbondanza di redenzione.
word.german1912: Israel, hoffe auf den HERRN! denn bei dem HERRN ist die Gnade und viel Erlösung bei ihm,
word.french1910: Israël, mets ton espoir en l'Eternel! Car la miséricorde est auprès de l'Eternel, Et la rédemption est auprès de lui en abondance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以色列啊！你要仰望耶和華，因為耶和華有慈愛，也有豐盛的救恩。
word.korean: 이스라엘아 여호와를 바랄지어다 ! 여호와께는 인자하심과 풍성한 구속이 있음이라
word.tagalog: Oh Israel, umasa ka sa Panginoon; sapagka't sa Panginoon ay may kagandahang-loob.
word.maori: E Iharaira, kia tumanako ki a Ihowa, kei a Ihowa hoki te mahi tohu, a kei a ia te hokonga nui.
word.cebuano: Oh Israel, lumaum ka kang Jehova; Kay kang Jehova anaa ang mahigugmaong-kalolot, Ug kaniya anaa ang madagayaong pagtubos.
word.hebrew: ז  יחל ישראל אל-יהוה    כי-עם-יהוה החסד והרבה עמו פדות
word.hebrewmodern: יחל ישראל אל יהוה כי עם יהוה החסד והרבה עמו פדות׃

word.kjv: Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.
word.thailand: จงให้อิสราเอลหวังใจในพระเยโฮวาห์ตั้งแต่กาลบัดนี้สืบไปเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Espera, oh Israel, en Jehová Desde ahora y para siempre.
word.latinvulgate: Si introiero in tabernaculum domus meæ ; si ascendero in lectum strati mei ;
word.italian1927: O Israele, spera nell’Eterno, da ora in perpetuo.
word.german1912: Israel, hoffe auf den HERRN von nun an bis in Ewigkeit!
word.french1910: Israël, mets ton espoir en l'Eternel, Dès maintenant et à jamais!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以色列啊！你要仰望耶和華，從現在直到永遠。
word.korean: 이스라엘아 ! 지금부터 영원까지 여호와를 바랄지어다
word.tagalog: Oh Israel, umasa ka sa Panginoon mula sa panahong ito at sa magpakailan pa man.
word.maori: E Iharaira, kia tumanako ki a Ihowa: aianei a ake tonu atu.
word.cebuano: Oh Israel, lumaum ka kang Jehova Sukad karon ngadto sa umalabut ug sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: ג  יחל ישראל אל-יהוה--    מעתה ועד-עולם
word.hebrewmodern: יחל ישראל אל יהוה מעתה ועד עולם׃
word.greekot: εἰ εἰσελεύσομαι εἰς σκήνωμα οἴκου μου εἰ ἀναβήσομαι ἐπὶ κλίνης στρωμνῆς μου

word.kjv: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God:
word.thailand: คนที่ผู้อุปถัมภ์ของเขาคือพระเยโฮวาห์ของยาโคบก็เป็นสุข คือผู้ที่ความหวังของเขาอยู่ในพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของเขา
word.spanish1909: Bienaventurado aquel en cuya ayuda es el Dios de Jacob, Cuya esperanza es en Jehová su Dios:
word.latinvulgate: Magnus Dominus noster, et magna virtus ejus ; et sapientiæ ejus non est numerus.
word.italian1927: Beato colui che ha l’Iddio di Giacobbe per suo aiuto, e la cui speranza è nell’Eterno, suo Dio,
word.german1912: Wohl dem, des Hilfe der Gott Jakobs ist; des Hoffnung auf den HERRN, seinem Gott, steht;
word.french1910: Heureux celui qui a pour secours le Dieu de Jacob, Qui met son espoir en l'Eternel, son Dieu!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以雅各的　神為自己的幫助，仰望耶和華他的　神的，這人就是有福的。
word.korean: 야곱의 하나님으로 자기 도움을 삼으며 여호와 자기 하나님에게 그 소망을 두는 자는 복이 있도다
word.tagalog: Maginhawa ang may pinaka saklolo sa Dios ni Jacob, na ang pagasa ay nasa Panginoon niyang Dios:
word.maori: ¶ Ka hari te tangata ko te Atua nei o Hakopa tona kaiawhina: ko tana e tumanako ai ko Ihowa, ko tona Atua;
word.cebuano: Malipayon siya nga anaa kaniya ang Dios ni Jacob alang sa iyang panabang, Kansang paglaum anaa kang Jehova nga iyang Dios:
word.hebrew: ה  אשרי--שאל יעקב בעזרו    שברו על-יהוה אלהיו
word.hebrewmodern: אשרי שאל יעקב בעזרו שברו על יהוה אלהיו׃
word.greekot: μέγας ὁ κύριος ἡμῶν καὶ μεγάλη ἡ ἰσχὺς αὐτοῦ καὶ τῆς συνέσεως αὐτοῦ οὐκ ἔστιν ἀριθμός

word.kjv: The LORD taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.
word.thailand: แต่พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงปรีดีในคนที่ยำเกรงพระองค์ ในคนที่ความหวังของเขาอยู่ในความเมตตาของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Complácese Jehová en los que le temen, Y en los que esperan en su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: L’Eterno prende piacere in quelli che lo temono, in quelli che sperano nella sua benignità.
word.german1912: Der HERR hat Gefallen an denen, die ihn fürchten, die auf seine Güte hoffen.
word.french1910: L'Eternel aime ceux qui le craignent, Ceux qui espèrent en sa bonté.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華喜悅敬畏他的人，喜悅仰望他慈愛的人。
word.korean: 자기를 경외하는 자와 그 인자하심을 바라는 자들을 기뻐하시는도다
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon ay naliligaya sa kanila na nangatatakot sa kaniya, sa nagsisiasa sa kaniyang kagandahang-loob.
word.maori: E manako ana a Ihowa ki te hunga e wehi ana i a ia, ki te hunga e tumanako ana ki tona aroha.
word.cebuano: Ang kalipay ni Jehova anaa kanila nga may kahadlok kaniya, Anaa niadtong mga nagalaum sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot.
word.hebrew: יא  רוצה יהוה את-יראיו--    את-המיחלים לחסדו
word.hebrewmodern: רוצה יהוה את יראיו את המיחלים לחסדו׃

word.kjv: The hope of the righteous shall be gladness: but the expectation of the wicked shall perish.
word.thailand: ความหวังของคนชอบธรรมจะจบลงในความยินดี แต่ความมุ่งหวังของความชั่วร้ายก็จะสูญเปล่า
word.spanish1909: La esperanza de los justos es alegría; Mas la esperanza de los impíos perecerá.
word.latinvulgate: Exspectatio justorum lætitia, spes autem impiorum peribit.
word.italian1927: L’aspettazione dei giusti è letizia, ma la speranza degli empi perirà.
word.german1912: Das Warten der Gerechten wird Freude werden; aber der Gottlosen Hoffnung wird verloren sein.
word.french1910: L'attente des justes n'est que joie, Mais l'espérance des méchants périra.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 義人的盼望使他們喜樂，惡人的希望終必幻滅。
word.korean: 의인은 영영히 이동되지 아니하여도 악인은 땅에 거하지 못하게 되느니라
word.tagalog: Ang pagasa ng matuwid ay magiging kasayahan: nguni't ang pagasa ng masama ay mawawala.
word.maori: Tumanako atu te hunga tika, koa iho; tumanako atu te hunga kino, ngaro iho.
word.cebuano: Ang paglaum sa matarung mao  ang kalipay; Apan ang gipaabut niadtong dautan mawagtang.
word.hebrew: כח  תוחלת צדיקים שמחה    ותקות רשעים תאבד
word.hebrewmodern: תוחלת צדיקים שמחה ותקות רשעים תאבד׃
word.greekot: ἐγχρονίζει δικαίοις εὐφροσύνη ἐλπὶς δὲ ἀσεβῶν ὄλλυται

word.kjv: When a wicked man dieth, his expectation shall perish: and the hope of unjust men perisheth.
word.thailand: เมื่อคนชั่วร้ายตาย ความหวังของเขาจะพินาศ และความมุ่งหวังของคนอธรรมก็สูญเปล่า
word.spanish1909: Cuando muere el hombre impío, perece su esperanza; Y la espectativa de los malos perecerá.
word.latinvulgate: Mortuo homine impio, nulla erit ultra spes, et exspectatio sollicitorum peribit.
word.italian1927: Quando un empio muore, la sua speranza perisce, e l’aspettazione degl’iniqui e annientata.
word.german1912: Wenn der gottlose Mensch stirbt, ist seine Hoffnung verloren und das Harren des Ungerechten wird zunichte.
word.french1910: A la mort du méchant, son espoir périt, Et l'attente des hommes iniques est anéantie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 惡人一死，他的希望就幻滅；有能力的人的盼望也消滅了。
word.korean: 의인은 환난에서 구원을 얻고 악인은 와서 그를 대신하느니라
word.tagalog: Pagka ang masamang tao ay namamatay, ang kaniyang pag-asa ay mapapasa pagkapahamak; at ang pagasa ng masama ay nawawala.
word.maori: ¶ I te matenga o te tangata kino, kore iho ana mea i tumanako atu ai: kahore noa iho he tumanakohanga ma te hunga he.
word.cebuano: Kong ang dautang tawo mamatay, ang iyang ginapaabut mahanaw; Ug ang paglaum sa kasal-anan mahanaw;
word.hebrew: ז  במות אדם רשע תאבד תקוה    ותוחלת אונים אבדה
word.hebrewmodern: במות אדם רשע תאבד תקוה ותוחלת אונים אבדה׃
word.greekot: δίκαιος ἐκ θήρας ἐκδύνει ἀντ' αὐτοῦ δὲ παραδίδοται ὁ ἀσεβής

word.kjv: The wicked is driven away in his wickedness: but the righteous hath hope in his death.
word.thailand: คนชั่วร้ายก็ถูกไล่ออกตามการกระทำชั่วร้ายของเขา แต่คนชอบธรรมมีความหวังในความมรณาของเขา
word.spanish1909: Por su maldad será lanzado el impío: Mas el justo en su muerte tiene esperanza.
word.latinvulgate: In malitia sua expelletur impius, sperat autem justus in morte sua.
word.italian1927: L’empio è travolto dalla sua sventura, ma il giusto spera anche nella morte.
word.german1912: Der Gottlose besteht nicht in seinem Unglück; aber der Gerechte ist auch in seinem Tod getrost.
word.french1910: Le méchant est renversé par sa méchanceté, Mais le juste trouve un refuge même en sa mort.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 惡人必因自己所行的惡事被推倒，義人死的時候仍有所倚靠。
word.korean: 악인은 그 환난에 엎드러져도 의인은 그 죽음에도 소망이 있느니라
word.tagalog: Ang masama ay manahagis sa kaniyang masamang gawa: nguni't ang matuwid ay may kanlungan sa kaniyang kamatayan.
word.maori: ¶ E uakina iho ana te tangata kino i runga i tona he; ko te tangata tika ia ka whai tumanakohanga i tona matenga.
word.cebuano: Ang dautan giunlod ngadto sa kahiladman tungod sa iyang buhat nga dautan; Apan ang matarung may usa ka dalangpanan sa iyang kamatayon.
word.hebrew: לב  ברעתו ידחה רשע    וחסה במותו צדיק
word.hebrewmodern: ברעתו ידחה רשע וחסה במותו צדיק׃
word.greekot: ἐν κακίᾳ αὐτοῦ ἀπωσθήσεται ἀσεβής ὁ δὲ πεποιθὼς τῇ ἑαυτοῦ ὁσιότητι δίκαιος

word.kjv: Chasten thy son while there is hope, and let not thy soul spare for his crying.
word.thailand: จงตีสอนบุตรชายของตนเมื่อยังมีความหวัง อย่าหมดกำลังใจเพราะเหตุการร้องไห้ของเขา
word.spanish1909: Castiga á tu hijo en tanto que hay esperanza; Mas no se excite tu alma para destruirlo.
word.latinvulgate: Erudi filium tuum ; ne desperes : ad interfectionem autem ejus ne ponas animam tuam.
word.italian1927: Castiga il tuo figliuolo, mentre c’è ancora speranza, ma non ti lasciar andare sino a farlo morire.
word.german1912: Züchtige deinen Sohn, solange Hoffnung da ist; aber laß deine Seele nicht bewegt werden, ihn zu töten.
word.french1910: Châtie ton fils, car il y a encore de l'espérance; Mais ne désire point le faire mourir.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 趁著還有指望的時候，要管教你的兒子；不可存心任他死亡。
word.korean: 네가 네 아들에게 소망이 있은즉 그를 징계하고 죽일 마음은 두지 말지니라
word.tagalog: Parusahan mo ang iyong anak, dangang may pagasa; at huwag mong ilagak ang iyong puso sa kaniyang ikapapahamak.
word.maori: ¶ Pakia tau tama, i te mea kua whai manakohanga; kaua hoki tou ngakau e whai tonu i te whakangaromanga mona.
word.cebuano: Castigoha ang imong anak, sa natan-aw mo nga aduna pay paglaum; Ug ayaw pag-ibutang ang imong kasingkasing sa iyang kalaglagan.
word.hebrew: יח  יסר בנך כי-יש תקוה    ואל-המיתו אל-תשא נפשך
word.hebrewmodern: יסר בנך כי יש תקוה ואל המיתו אל תשא נפשך׃
word.greekot: ἄκουε υἱέ παιδείαν πατρός σου ἵνα σοφὸς γένῃ ἐπ' ἐσχάτων σου

word.kjv: Seest thou a man wise in his own conceit? there is more hope of a fool than of him.
word.thailand: ท่านเห็นคนที่คิดว่าตัวเองฉลาดหรือ ยังมีหวังในคนโง่ได้มากกว่าในคนเช่นนั้น
word.spanish1909: ¿Has visto hombre sabio en su opinión? Más esperanza hay del necio que de él.
word.latinvulgate: Vidisti hominem sapientem sibi videri ? magis illo spem habebit insipiens.
word.italian1927: Hai tu visto un uomo che si crede savio? C’è più da sperare da uno stolto che da lui.
word.german1912: Wenn du einen siehst, der sich weise dünkt, da ist an einem Narren mehr Hoffnung denn an ihm.
word.french1910: Si tu vois un homme qui se croit sage, Il y a plus à espérer d'un insensé que de lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你見過自以為有智慧的人嗎？愚昧人比他更有指望。
word.korean: 네가 스스로 지혜롭게 여기는 자를 보느냐 그보다 미련한 자에게 오히려 바랄 것이 있느니라
word.tagalog: Nakikita mo ba ang taong pantas sa ganang kaniyang sarili. May higit na pagasa sa mangmang kay sa kaniya.
word.maori: ¶ Ka kite koe i te tangata e mea ana ki a ia he whakaaro nui? Ki ta te whakaaro tera e rahi ake ta te wairangi i tana.
word.cebuano: Nakita mo ba ang usa ka tawo nga manggialamon sa iyang kaugalingong paghunahuna? Aduna pay labaw nga paglaum sa usa ka buang kay kaniya.
word.hebrew: יב  ראית--איש חכם בעיניו    תקוה לכסיל ממנו
word.hebrewmodern: ראית איש חכם בעיניו תקוה לכסיל ממנו׃
word.greekot: εἶδον ἄνδρα δόξαντα παρ' ἑαυτῷ σοφὸν εἶναι ἐλπίδα μέντοι ἔσχεν μᾶλλον ἄφρων αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Seest thou a man that is hasty in his words? there is more hope of a fool than of him.
word.thailand: เจ้าเห็นคนที่ปากไวหรือ ยังมีหวังในคนโง่มากกว่าเขา
word.spanish1909: ¿Has visto hombre ligero en sus palabras? Más esperanza hay del necio que de él.
word.latinvulgate: Vidisti hominem velocem ad loquendum ? stultitia magis speranda est quam illius correptio.
word.italian1927: Hai tu visto un uomo precipitoso nel suo parlare? C’è più da sperare da uno stolto che da lui.
word.german1912: Siehst du einen, der schnell ist zu reden, da ist am Narren mehr Hoffnung denn an ihm.
word.french1910: Si tu vois un homme irréfléchi dans ses paroles, Il y a plus à espérer d'un insensé que de lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你見過言語急躁的人嗎？愚昧人比他更有指望。
word.korean: 네가 언어에 조급한 사람을 보느냐 그보다 미련한 자에게 오히려 바랄 것이 있느니라
word.tagalog: Nakikita mo ba ang tao, na nagmamadali sa kaniyang mga salita? May pagasa pa sa mangmang kay sa kaniya.
word.maori: ¶ Ka kite ranei koe i te tangata kaika ki te korero? engari te wairangi ka totika ake i a ia.
word.cebuano: Nakakita ba ikaw sa usa ka tawo nga madali-dalion sa iyang mga pulong? Aduna pay paglaum sa usa ka buang kay kaniya.
word.hebrew: כ  חזית--איש אץ בדבריו    תקוה לכסיל ממנו
word.hebrewmodern: חזית איש אץ בדבריו תקוה לכסיל ממנו׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν ἴδῃς ἄνδρα ταχὺν ἐν λόγοις γίνωσκε ὅτι ἐλπίδα ἔχει μᾶλλον ἄφρων αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: For to him that is joined to all the living there is hope: for a living dog is better than a dead lion.
word.thailand: ส่วนคนใดที่มั่วสุมอยู่กับคนทั้งปวงที่มีชีวิต คนนั้นก็มีความหวังใจได้ ด้วยว่าสุนัขที่เป็นก็ยังดีกว่าสิงโตที่ตายแล้ว
word.spanish1909: Aún hay esperanza para todo aquél que está entre los vivos; porque mejor es perro vivo que león muerto.
word.latinvulgate: Nemo est qui semper vivat, et qui hujus rei habeat fiduciam ; melior est canis vivus leone mortuo.
word.italian1927: Per chi è associato a tutti gli altri viventi c’è speranza; perché un cane vivo val meglio d’un leone morto.
word.german1912: Denn bei allen Lebendigen ist, was man wünscht: Hoffnung; denn ein lebendiger Hund ist besser denn ein toter Löwe.
word.french1910: Pour tous ceux qui vivent il y a de l'espérance; et même un chien vivant vaut mieux qu'un lion mort.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 凡有生命的（“凡有生命的”原文作“凡與所有活人有關聯的”），就有盼望，因為活狗比死獅更好。
word.korean: 모든 산 자 중에 참예한 자가 소망이 있음은 산 개가 죽은 사자보다 나음이니라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't sa kaniya, na napisan sa lahat na may buhay ay may pagasa: sapagka't ang buhay na aso ay maigi kay sa patay na leon.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te tangata hoki e tuhono ana ki te hunga ora katoa ka whai tumanakohanga: pai atu hoki te kuri ora i te raiona mate.
word.cebuano: Kay alang kaniya nga anaa uban sa tanan nga mga buhi aduna pay paglaum; kay ang buhi nga iro labi pang maayo kay sa leon nga patay.
word.hebrew: ד כי מי אשר יבחר (יחבר) אל כל החיים יש בטחון  כי לכלב חי הוא טוב מן האריה המת
word.hebrewmodern: כי מי אשר יבחר אל כל החיים יש בטחון כי לכלב חי הוא טוב מן האריה המת׃
word.greekot: ὅτι τίς ὃς κοινωνεῖ πρὸς πάντας τοὺς ζῶντας ἔστιν ἐλπίς ὅτι ὁ κύων ὁ ζῶν αὐτὸς ἀγαθὸς ὑπὲρ τὸν λέοντα τὸν νεκρόν

word.kjv: For the grave cannot praise thee, death can not celebrate thee: they that go down into the pit cannot hope for thy truth.
word.thailand: เพราะแดนคนตายสรรเสริญพระองค์ไม่ได้ ความมรณายกย่องพระองค์ไม่ได้ บรรดาคนที่ลงไปยังปากแดนคนตายนั้น จะหวังในความจริงของพระองค์ไม่ได้
word.spanish1909: Porque el sepulcro no te celebrará, ni te alabará la muerte; Ni los que descienden al hoyo esperarán tu verdad.
word.latinvulgate: Quia non infernus confitebitur tibi, neque mors laudabit te : non exspectabunt qui descendunt in lacum veritatem tuam.
word.italian1927: Poiché non è il soggiorno de’ morti che possa lodarti, non è la morte che ti possa celebrare; quei che scendon nella fossa non possono più sperare nella tua fedeltà.
word.german1912: Denn die Hölle lobt dich nicht; so rühmt dich der Tod nicht, und die in die Grube fahren, warten nicht auf deine Wahrheit;
word.french1910: Ce n'est pas le séjour des morts qui te loue, Ce n'est pas la mort qui te célèbre; Ceux qui sont descendus dans la fosse n'espèrent plus en ta fidélité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 陰間不能稱謝你，死亡不能讚美你，下坑的人都不能仰望你的信實。
word.korean: 음부가 주께 사례하지 못하며 사망이 주를 찬양하지 못하며 구덩이에 들어간 자가 주의 신실을 바라지 못하되
word.tagalog: Sapagka't hindi ka maaring purihin ng Sheol, hindi ka maaring ipagdiwang ng kamatayan! Silang nagsisibaba sa hukay ay hindi makaaasa sa iyong katotohanan.
word.maori: E kore hoki e taea e te reinga te whakawhetai ki a koe, e kore te mate e ahei te whakamoemiti ki a koe; ko te hunga e heke ana ki te rua kahore o ratou tumanako ki tou pono.
word.cebuano: Kay ang Sheol dili makadayeg kanimo, ang kamatayon dili makag-pasidungog kanimo: Sila nga manaug sa gahong dili makalaum sa imong kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: יח כי לא שאול תודך מות יהללך לא ישברו יורדי בור אל אמתך
word.hebrewmodern: כי לא שאול תודך מות יהללך לא ישברו יורדי בור אל אמתך׃
word.greekot: οὐ γὰρ οἱ ἐν ᾅδου αἰνέσουσίν σε οὐδὲ οἱ ἀποθανόντες εὐλογήσουσίν σε οὐδὲ ἐλπιοῦσιν οἱ ἐν ᾅδου τὴν ἐλεημοσύνην σου

word.kjv: Thou art wearied in the greatness of thy way; yet saidst thou not, There is no hope: thou hast found the life of thine hand; therefore thou wast not grieved.
word.thailand: เจ้าเหน็ดเหนื่อยเพราะระยะทางไกลของเจ้า แต่เจ้ามิได้พูดว่า "หมดหวัง" เจ้าประสบชีวิตแห่งมือของเจ้า และเจ้าจึงมิได้โศกเศร้า
word.spanish1909: En la multitud de tus caminos te cansaste, mas no dijiste: No hay remedio; hallaste la vida de tu mano, por tanto no te arrepentiste.
word.latinvulgate: In multitudine viæ tuæ laborasti ; non dixisti : Quiescam. Vitam manus tuæ invenisti ; propterea non rogasti.
word.italian1927: Per il tuo lungo cammino ti stanchi, ma non dici: "E’ inutile!" Tu trovi ancora del vigore nella tua mano, e perciò non ti senti esausta.
word.german1912: Du zerarbeitest dich in der Menge deiner Wege und sprichst nicht: Ich lasse es; sondern weil du Leben findest in deiner Hand, wirst du nicht müde.
word.french1910: A force de marcher tu te fatigues, Et tu ne dis pas: J'y renonce! Tu trouves encore de la vigueur dans ta main: Aussi n'es-tu pas dans l'abattement.
